en: The Russia-China relations have been progressing very smoothly and made enumerable great achievements.

zhs: 俄方愿同中方共同努力，将两国关系推向更高水平。
en: Russia is willing to work with China and push the bilateral relations to a higher level.

zhs: 王晨参加会见。
en: Wang Chen attended the meeting.

zhs: 三十一号下午，梅德韦杰夫向人民英雄纪念碑敬献花圈。
en: In the afternoon of October 31th, Medvedev laid a wreath at the Monument to the People’s Heroes.

zhs: 一致表示，完全拥护习近平同志代表中共十八届中央委员会所作的报告。
en: The meeting pledged full support to the report delivered by Comrade Xi Jinping on behalf of the 18th CPC Central Committee.

zhs: 大家坚信，新一届中共中央领导集体一定能够不辱使命、不负重托，引领承载中国人民伟大梦想的航船驶向更加辉煌的未来与会人员一致认为，中共十九大是在全面建成小康社会决胜阶段、中国特色社会主义进入新时代的关键时期。召开的一次十分重要的大会。
en: Participants hold a strong conviction that the new CPC leadership will live up to the great trust place on and the lofty mission assigned to it and navigate the giant ship bearing the great dream of the Chinese people to a bright future. Attendees agreed that the 19th CPC National Congress is a meeting of great importance taking place during the decisive stage in building a moderately prosperous society in all respects and the development of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

zhs: 习近平总书记所作的报告提出一系列新的重要思想、重要观点、重大判断、重大举措，是一篇闪耀着马克思主义光辉的纲领性文献。
en: The report delivered by General Secretary Xi Jinping is a programmatic document radiating the brilliance of Marxism, which puts forth a series of important thoughts, ideas, judgements and measures.

zhs: 与会人员一致表示，全面深入学习宣传贯彻中共十九大精神，是当前和今后一个时期人民政协的首要政治任务。
en: There was a consensus among attendees that the political priority of the Chinese People’s Political Consultative Conference at present and in the years to come is to comprehensively study, propagandize and implement the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress.

zhs: 一要深刻领会习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想， 不断巩固团结奋斗的共同思想政治基础。
en: Firstly, it is necessary to digest Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era and continuously consolidate the common political and ideological basis for unity and struggle.

zhs: 团结带领政协委员坚定贯彻执行党的基本理论、基本路线、基本方略。
en: Secondly, it is necessary to unite and lead the CPPCC members to unswervingly carry out the Party’s basic theories, guidelines and policies.

zhs: 三要聚焦党和国家中心任务履职尽责，为决胜全面建成小康社会、建设社会主义现代化国家献计出力。
en: Thirdly, it is necessary to focus on the central tasks of the Party and state and contribute ideas and efforts to the victory of building a moderately prosperous society in all respects.

zhs: 四要充分发挥政协作为协商民主重要渠道和专门协商机构作用，把协商民主落实到履职全过程和各方面。
en: Fourthly, it is necessary to give full play to CPPCC’s role as an important channel of consultative democracy and a specialized organization of consultation, implementing consultative democracy throughout the process of performing duties and into all aspects of work.

zhs: 五要更好发挥政协作为统一战线组织功能作用，动员全体中华儿女共圆中国梦。
en: Fifthly, it is necessary to fully exploit the power of CPPCC as a united front organization that enables it to mobilize the Chinese nation to fulfill the Chinese dream.

zhs: 六要以增强履职本领为重点加强政协自身建设，完善履职制度，提高履职实效。
en: Sixthly, it is necessary to reinforce CPPCC’s self-construction with an emphasis on beefing up its competence in performing duties, improve the duty-performing system, and enhance the duty-performing efficiency.

zhs: 会议通过了《关于学习贯彻中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会精神的决议》
en: The meeting adopted the Resolution on Studying

zhs: 和《关于部分修改〈中国人民政治协商会议章程〉的决定》
en: and Implementing the Essence of the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China as well as the Decision on Partial Revision of the Constitution of the Chinese people’s Political Consultative Conference.

zhs: 会议要求以中共十九大精神为指导，总结好本届政协工作，做好全国政协十三届一次会议筹备工作。
en: The meeting asked to summarize well the work of CPPCC and prepare well for the first session of 13th CPPCC National Committee.

zhs: 一号国务院副总理张高丽，中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理汪洋，国务院副总理刘延东在北京人民大会堂接受俄罗斯总理梅德韦杰夫代表俄罗斯政府授予的友谊勋章。
en: On November 1th, Zhang Gaoli, Vice Premier of the State Council, Wang Yang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council, and Liu Yandong, Vice Premier of the State Council received the Order of Friendship from Premier Medvedev on behalf of the Russian government at the Great Hall of the People.

zhs: 促进世界和平、发展国家间友好关系作出杰出贡献的人士
en: This award is given to individuals whose efforts significantly contribute to promoting world peace and developing friendly relationship among countries.

zhs: 中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理汪洋一号下午在中南海紫光阁会见斯里兰卡外长马拉帕纳。
en: In the afternoon of November 1th, Wang Yang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council met with Minister of Foreign Affairs of Sri Lanka Tilak Marapana in Ziguangge, Zhongnanhai.

zhs: 今年是中斯建交六十周年和《米胶协定》签署六十五周年。
en: The year of 2017 marks the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between China and Sri Lanka and the 65th anniversary of the signing of the Agreement on Rice for Rubber.

zhs: 中方将认真落实中共十九大确定的亲诚惠容理念和与邻为善、以邻为伴周边外交方针，加强同斯里兰卡等发展中国家的团结合作。
en: China will act conscientiously on the neighborhood diplomacy of “amity, sincerity, mutual benefit and inclusiveness” and the foreign policy of “developing good relationship and partnership with neighboring countries”, which were established at the 19th CPC National Congress.

zhs: 马拉帕纳祝贺中共十九大胜利召开。
en: Tilak Marapana congratulated on the triumphant convention of the 19th CPC National Congress.

zhs: 他表示，斯里兰卡视中国为亲密朋友和发展伙伴。
en: He said Sri Lanka regards China as a close friend and a reliable partner.

zhs: 学习贯彻党的十九大精神中央宣讲团动员会一号在京召开，中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记王沪宁出席会议并讲话。
en: A mobilization meeting of the Publicity Department, CCCPC intended for studying and implementing the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress was convened on November 1th. Wang Hu’ning, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Secretary of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee attended the meeting and delivered a keynote speech.

zhs: 他表示结合党中央的重要会议、重大工作部署、组织开展宣讲活动，受到广大干部群众欢迎。
en: He said teach-ins associated with the important meetings and work deployment of the CPC Central Committee are warmly welcomed by both carders and the masses.

zhs: 习近平总书记对做好党中央精神宣讲工作一贯高度重视，提出了明确要求，我们要切实做好这次集中宣讲工作。
en: General Secretary Xi Jinping has always attached great importance to the publicity of the CPC Central Committee’s ideas and explicitly requires that the centralized publicity of the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress should be well accomplished.

zhs: 更好把广大干部群众的思想和行动统一到党的十九大精神上来。
en: The publicity is expected to synchronize the thoughts and actions of carders and the masses with the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress.

zhs: 王沪宁表示要牢牢把握在学懂弄通坐实上下功夫的要求，精心做好党的十九大精神集中宣讲
en: Wang Hu’ning suggested that the centralized publicity of the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress should be meticulously carried out based on the requirement of “comprehension and implementation” to deepen the work of “studying,

zhs: 推动学习宣传贯彻工作，往实里走往深里走，引导全党自觉维护习近平总书记党中央的核心、全党的核心地位，维护党中央权威和集中统一领导。
en: propagandizing and implementing” and guide the Party to defend the central role of General Secretary Xi Jinping and uphold the authority and centralized leadership of the CPC Central Committee.

zhs: 党的十八大以来，党和国家事业之所以全面开创新局面，根本在于以习近平同志为核心的党中央
en: Since the 18th CPC National Congress, the cause of the Party and state has entered a new phase, which is fundamentally attributed to the strategic leadership of the CPC Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core and to the scientific guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era

zhs: 据其定向、运筹帷幄在于习近平新时代的中国特色社会主义思想的科学指引，要紧紧围绕习近平新时代 中国特色社会主义思想这个主线。
en: We should revolve around the main thread of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era.

zhs: 讲清楚党的十九大的鲜明主题，讲清楚习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的丰富内涵，讲清楚党的十八大以来党和国家事业发生的历史性变革。
en: We should make clear the striking theme of 19th CPC National Congress, the rich connotations of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, and the historical changes of the cause of the Party and state since the 18th CPC National Congress.

zhs: 讲清楚中国特色社会主义进入新时代的重大意义，讲清楚我国社会主要矛盾变化的深远影响，讲清楚两个一百年奋斗目标。
en: We should make clear the significance of socialism with Chinese characteristics as it enters a new era, the far-reaching influence of the change of the society’s principal contradiction, and the Two Centenary Goals.

zhs: 讲清楚坚定不移全面从严治党的重大部署，把广大干部群众的思想和行动统一到党的十九大精神上来。
en: We should make clear China’s strategic deployment of strict rule over the Party and synchronization of the thoughts and actions of carders and the masses with the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress.

zhs: 推动党的十九大精神走进基层、走进群众。
en: We should integrate the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress into the grass-roots units and the masses.

zhs: 中共中央政治局委员、中宣部部长黄坤明主持会议。
en: Huang Kunming, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Head of the Central Propaganda Department, presided over the meeting.

zhs: 本台消息，为推动兴起学习宣传贯彻党的十九大精神热潮，中央决定由中宣部会同中央有关部门组成
en: According to our news, for promoting the upsurge of studying, propagating and implementing the essence of the 19th National Congress of CPC, the Party central committee decided to designate the Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the CPC to joint hands with relevant departments of the central committee in setting up a propaganda team.

zhs: 成员有中共中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中央纪委副书记杨晓渡，中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记陈敏尔。
en: The group members include such 36 comrades as Yang Xiaodu, member of the Communist Party's Politburo, member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee and vice secretary of the Party's Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, Chen Min'er, member of the Communist Party's Politburo and secretary of Chongqing Municipal Party Committee,

zhs: 中共中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中央宣传部部长黄坤明等三十六位同志。
en: Huang Kunming, member of the Communist Party's Politburo, member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee and minister of Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee and so on.

zhs: 从一号起，中央宣讲团成员进行集体备课。
en: Starting from the first day of the month, the central propaganda team will prepare lessons collectively.

zhs: 五号起赴全国各地宣讲
en: The team will kick off the propaganda across the country as of the 5th.

zhs: 一分部署、九分落实。
en: With 10% efforts in deployment, 90% efforts will be made in implementation.

zhs: 十九大代表回到基层后，首要的事情就是把党的十九大报告精神
en: After the delegates to the 19th CPC National Congress returned to the grass roots, the top priority is to convey the essence of the report delivered at the 19th CPC National Congress

zhs: 第一时间传达到位
en: in place at a first time

zhs: 要结合上海正在进行的智慧公安建设，把大数据、云计算等这些新技术，运用到工作中去。
en: We shall combine with the on-going smart public security building in Shanghai and apply big data, cloud computing and other new technologies in the practical work.

zhs: 而远在山西大宁县的十九大代表、乡村医生贺星龙，回到家乡后，在行医路上把十九大精神送到乡亲们身边。
en: He Xinglong, a delegate to the 19th CPC National Congress and a rural doctor who lived in Daning County, Shanxi, after returning his home town, sent the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress to his fellow villagers on the way of practice.

zhs: 俺
en: I

zhs: 报告提出，实施健康中国战略，加强基层医疗卫生服务体系和全科医生队伍建设，你看这下以后咱村里
en: The report noted to implement healthy China strategy, strengthen the community medical and health care service system and general practitioner team building. You can find, when I convey

zhs: 给老百姓传达到，把习总书记、党中央对大家的关怀关心传达到，大家都觉得
en: the concern from General Secretary Xin Jinping and the Party Central Committee to the villagers, all of them

zhs: 我们党的领导下，日子会越来越好。
en: are feeling that our life has become better and better.

zhs: 本台消息，明天出版的人民日报发表评论员文章开启全面建设社会主义现代化国家新征程，五论学习贯彻党的
en: According to our news, tomorrow, People's Daily will release a commentary titled starting a new journey of building a socialist modern country

zhs: 中联部今天举办专题吹风会，面向一百五十多个国家的驻华使节以及国际组织、外国企业代表
en: Today, the CPC International Liaison Department holds a briefing meeting for interpreting the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress to

zhs: 解读中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会精神。
en: the envoys of more than 150 countries in China, international organizations and delegates of foreign enterprises.

zhs: 出席吹风会的驻华使节们表示，中共十九大意义重大
en: The envoys present at the briefing noted that, the 19th CPC National Congress is of great significance

zhs: 大会提出了习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想，提出了一系列符合中国实际的重大战略举措，不仅为中国的发展指明了方向
en: The congress has proposed Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era and set forth a series of important strategic measures that accord with China's reality. It has not only given a specific direction for development of China

zhs: 也将对世界和平、繁荣与发展产生深远影响
en: but also made a profound and lasting influence for the peace, prosperity and development of the world

zhs: 武隆区、秀山土家族苗族自治县，四川省南部县、广安区，贵州省赤水市，西藏自治区城关区、亚东县、卡若区、巴宜区、乃东区
en: Wulong District, Xiushan Autonomous County of Tujia and Miao Nationalities, Nanbu County and Guang'an District of Sichuan Province, Chishui City of Guizhou Province, Chengguan District, Yadong County, Karuo District, Bayi District and Naidong District of Tibet Autonomous Region

zhs: 和河南兰考县，全国已有二十八个贫困县脱贫摘帽。
en: and Lankao County of Henan Province, people in 28 poverty-stricken counties in rural areas have been lifted out of poverty.

zhs: 贫困县退出需要通过初核、复核和评估专项检查。
en: The exit of poverty-stricken counties needs to pass the preliminary verification, secondary verification and special inspection for assessment.

zhs: 公示无异议才能退出，退出标准也十分严格。
en: Only those which have no objection during the publicity can exist from the list of poverty-stricken counties. The exit standard is also stringent.

zhs: 贫困发生率如果低于百分之二和百分之三的，错退率、漏评率低于百分之二的，群众认可度高于百分之九十的同意它退出，但是这四个指标都是单一的否定指标。
en: If poverty incidence is lower than 2% and 3%, 2% of them are exited by mistake or missing in listing, 90% recognized by the mass, can a poverty-stricken county exist from the list of poverty-stricken counties. However, any one of the four indexes can vote down.

zhs: 贫困县脱贫后不脱政策、不脱帮扶、不脱措施。
en: After the poverty-stricken counties are lifted out of poverty, relevant policies, supports and measures shall be continued for them.

zhs: 今天，人力资源和社会保障部公布前三季度全国城镇新增就业一千零九十七万人，同比增加三十万人。
en: Today, Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security releases that 10.97 million new jobs have been created in the first three quarters, up by 300,000 year on year.

zhs: 十月份中国制造业采购经理指数为百分之五十一点六，连续十三个月保持在百分之五十一以上较高水平。
en: The Purchasing Manager's Index (PMI) of Chinese manufacturing industry in October is 51.6%, maintaining a high level of more than 51% for 13 months in row.

zhs: 高耗能、高污染行业下降超两个百分点，而高技术产业、装备制造业和消费品行业保持平稳较快发展。
en: The industries with high energy consumption and high pollution decline by 2 percentage points while hi-tech industry, equipment manufacturing industry and consumer products industry keep growing steadily and quickly.

zhs: 保监会表示，从十一月一号起正式实施《保险销售行为可回溯管理暂行办法》，明确电话销售业务应实施全险种、全过程录音。
en: China Insurance Regulatory Commission noted that, from November 1, Interim Measures for Administration of Traceability for Insurance Sales Behaviors will be officially put into implementation as of November 1, specifying that the telemarketing businesses shall be performed with whole-process sound recording for all the types of insurance.

zhs: 成立省级律师行业党委。
en: A provincial-level party committee is established for profession of law.

zhs: 近日，中央电视台和国际足联共同宣布，中央电视台获得二零一八至二零二二年国际足联各项赛事
en: Recently, CCTV and FIFA jointly announced that CCTV has obtained

en: an exclusive full-media copyright of FIFA events in Chinese mainland in 2018-2022.

zhs: 本次合约包括的赛事有二零一八年俄罗斯世界杯、二零二二年卡塔尔世界杯等。
en: The events contained in the contract include the 2018 Russia FIFA World Cup and the 2022 Qatar FIFA World Cup etc.

zhs: 当天下午三点左右，一名男子驾驶一辆皮卡在纽约地标新世贸中心附近道路上连撞多人。
en: Around 3 o'clock of the day, a man drove a pickup truck to bump against many people on the highway close to the new WTC, a landmark of New York.

zhs: 这是一起恐怖袭击。
en: This is a terrorist attack.

zhs: 据媒体报道，此人宣称以极端组织名义发动袭击。
en: According to media report, the man declared to launch the attack in the name of an extreme organization.

zhs: 这是曼哈顿的西侧的一条快速路。
en: It is an expressway on the west side of Manhattan.

zhs: 相当于我们国内常说的环路，它是能够经经常能够快速通过的，就在前面不远的地方大家可以看到
en: It is equivalent to a ring road we usually mention at home. It usually allows fast access. It is just ahead not far away. You can find it.

zhs: 仍然被警察封锁着，那个区域我们是无法跨入。
en: It is still blockaded by police, so that area is not accessible for us.

zhs: 袭击发生后，纽约警方已投入更多警力和资源
en: After the attack occurred, the police of New York has put more forces and resources

zhs: 保证市民安全。
en: to ensure the security of citizens.

zhs: 美国总统特朗普表示，进一步加强对外来移民的审查工作。
en: The US president Trump said more efforts would be made for dealing with the review of immigrants.

zhs: 接下来看国际快讯。
en: Next, let's watch international express.

zhs: 十一月一号，俄罗斯总统普京到访伊朗，访问期间将重点与伊朗领导人磋商叙利亚危机以及两国的能源合作。
en: On November 1, Russian President Vladimir Putin paid a visit to Iran. During his visit, he will focus on consultation with Iran leaders on the Syrian crisis and cooperation of both countries in energy.

zhs: 俄伊两国均支持叙利亚巴沙尔政府。
en: Both Rusia and Iran support Syria's government of President Bashar al-Assad.

zhs: 近期，伊朗与美国在伊核问题上针锋相对。
en: Recently, Iran and USA are in diametrical opposition to each other.

zhs: 外界也非常关注俄罗斯在此问题上的态度。
en: The outside world is very concerned about Russia's attitude on this issue.

zhs: 安倍随后组建了新一届内阁，原有阁僚全部留任。
en: Then Abe formed a new cabinet, with all the original cabinet ministers staying on.

zhs: 在十月二十二号举行的众院选举中，自民党和公明党组成的执政联盟获得超过三分之二议席。
en: At the election of the House of Representatives held on October 22, the ruling alliance composed of Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) and Komeito obtained more than two thirds of seats.

zhs: 中央军委举行晋升上将军衔仪式，习近平向晋升上将军衔的张升民颁发命令状并表示祝贺。
en: The Central Military Commission held a ceremony for promoting high-ranking officers to the military rank of general. Xi Jinping issued a writ to Zhang Shengmin who was promoted to the military rank of general and expressed his congratulation to him.

zhs: 应国家主席习近平邀请，美国总统特朗普将对我国进行国事访问。
en: At the invitation of president Xi Jinping, the US president Trump will pay a state visit to China.

zhs: 中共中央做出关于认真学习宣传贯彻党的十九大精神的决定。
en: The CPC Central Committee made a decision on earnestly studying, propagating and implementing the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress.

en: General Secretary Xi Jinping led the members of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee

en: to pay respect to the 1st National Congress of the CPC and the red boat on South Lake for announcing the firm political belief of the new generation of Party leadership. The move has greatly built up the inner strength of the numerous Party members and cadres in remaining true to our original aspiration, keeping our mission firmly in mind and

zhs: 永远奋斗的精神力量，十二届全国人大常委会第三十次会议举行联组会议，审议并专题询问固体废物污染环境防治法实施情况。
en: working hard forever. The 30th Meeting of the Standing Committee of the 12th National People's Congress held a joint group session for consideration and special inquiry on implementation of Law on the Prevention and Control of Pollution Caused by Solid Wastes.

zhs: 首次载入联合国大会安全决议。
en: It was included into the safety resolution of the United Nations General Assembly.

zhs: 中央军委晋升上将军衔仪式十一月二号在北京八一大楼隆重举行。
en: The ceremony for the Central Military Commission in promoting high-ranking officers to the military rank of general was held on November 2 in the August 1st Building of Beijing.

zhs: 下午四时三十分时晋衔仪式在庄严的国歌声中开始。
en: At 4:30 p.m., the ceremony for promotion was started with the solemn national anthem.

zhs: 中央 中央军委副主席许其亮宣读了中央军委主席习近平签署的
en: The vice chairman of the Central Military Commission Xu Qiliang read out the xxx signed by the chairman of the Central Military Commission Xi Jinping

en: Group photo

en: The members of the Central Military Commission Wei Fenghe, Li Zuocheng, Miao Hua and heads of departments under the Central Military Commission and leaders above deputy heads of theatre from large units in Beijing etc.

zhs: 本台消息，应国家主席习近平邀请，美利坚合众国总统唐纳德·特朗普将于十一月八日至十日对中国进行国事访问。
en: According to our news, at the invitation of president Xi Jinping, the president of the United States of America Donald Trump will pay a state visit to China on November 8-10.

zhs: 届时，两国领导人将就中美关系和共同关心的重大国际与地区问题深入交换意见。
en: By that time, the heads of the two countries will carry out an in-depth exchange on sino-American relation and the major regional and international issues of common concern.

zhs: 注入新的强劲动力
en: Inject new strong impetus

zhs: 党和国家工作全局，事关中国特色社会主义事业长远发展，事关最广大人民根本利益
en: Overall situation of the Party and the state, has a direct bearing on the long-term development of the socialist cause with Chinese characteristics and the interests of the great majority of the people

zhs: 坚定道路自信、理论自信、制度自信、文化自信，为实现推进现代化建设、完成祖国统一、维护世界和平
en: persist in the confidence of the road, theory, system and culture, realize such three historic missions as pushing forward the modernization drive, accomplishing the reunification of the motherland, upholding the world peace

zhs: 与促进共同发展三大历史任务，为决胜全面建成小康社会、夺取新时代中国特色社会主义伟大胜利
en: and promoting the common development of all nations, make more efforts in building a moderately prosperous society in all respects and win a great victory of socialism with Chinese characteristics for new era

zhs: 实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦、实现人民对美好生活的向往继续奋斗，具有重大现实意义和深远历史意义。
en: To make continued efforts in realizing the Chinese Dream of the rejuvenation of the Chinese nation and achieving the people's aspiration for a better life is of great importance both in reality and in history.

zhs: 《决定》指出，要全面准确学习领会党的十九大精神，深刻领会党的十九大的主题，深刻领会习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的
en: The Decision pointed out that we shall fully and accurately study and comprehend the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress, have a thorough knowledge of the theme of the 19th CPC National Congress and Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era

zhs: 实现第一个百年奋斗目标和向第二个百年奋斗目标进军，深刻领会社会主义经济建设、政治建设
en: March towards the realization of the goal for the first century and the second century and thoroughly understand the socialist economic and political advancement

zhs: 外交工作的重大部署，深刻领会坚定不移全面从严治党的重大部署。
en: An important plan for diplomacy, fully understand the major deployment in exercising self-discipline inside the Party in an unswerving and all-around manner.

zhs: 《决定》指出，要认真做好党的十九大精神的学习宣传
en: The Decision pointed out that we shall earnestly carry out the study and publicity of the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress

zhs: 切实抓好学习培训，集中开展宣讲活动，精心组织新闻宣传，认真组织研究阐释。
en: Deal with learning and training properly, strive to launch the propaganda campaign, carefully organize the press publicity and the studying and interpretation.

zhs: 要弘扬理论联系实际的学风
en: We shall carry forward the academic atmosphere of linking theory with practice

zhs: 切实提高解决问题、推动发展的能力。
en: Effectively improve the capacity of solving the problem and advancing the development.

zhs: 要切实加强组织领导，各级党委（党组）要切实负起领导责任
en: We shall earnestly strengthen the organizational leadership and urge Party committees (leading party groups) at all levels to assume the responsibilities of leadership

zhs: 牢牢把握正确导向，着力增强吸引力感染力。
en: Firmly grasp the correct orientation and focus on making it more attractive and influential.

zhs: 各地区各部门要及时将学习宣传贯彻党的十九大精神的情况
en: All the regions and departments shall report the situation on studying, propagating and implementing the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress to

zhs: 报告党中央
en: the the Party Central Committee promptly

zhs: 只要全党全国各族人民团结一心、苦干实干，中华民族伟大复兴的巨轮就一定能够乘风破浪，胜利驶向光辉的彼岸。
en: So long as the whole Party and the people of all ethnic groups in the country unit as one and work hard, the gigantic ship for realizing the great rejuvenation of Chinese nation can, without question, brave the wind and waves and sail to the brilliant destination triumphantly.

zhs: 总书记的话语极大的凝聚起了
en: The remarks made by the general secretary have gathered

zhs: 全国人民不忘初心、牢记使命、矢志奋斗的信心和力量。
en: the confidence and strength of the people across the country in remaining true to our original aspiration, keeping our mission firmly in mind and struggling in an unswerving way.

zhs: 从饱经沧桑的石库门建筑，到嘉兴南湖的一叶红船，中国共产党从这里诞生
en: From the stone-gate buildings with great vicissitudes to a red boat on South Lake, Jiaxing, the Communist Party of China was born here

zhs: 党的十九大，擘画了党和国家事业发展的宏伟蓝图，开启了一个崭新的时代。
en: The 19th CPC National Congresses has drawn a splendid blueprint for the development cause of the Party and the state and ushered in a brand new era.

zhs: 十月三十一号，习近平总书记带领中央政治局常委瞻仰了一大会址
en: On October 31, General Secretary Xi Jinping led the members of the Standing Committee of the CPC Political Bureau to visit the site of the 1st National Congress of the CPC

zhs: 新的领导集体又回到党的诞生地，也开启了我们新时代惊天动地的民族复兴的，一个伟大事业。
en: The new collective leadership returned to the birthplace of the Party, which has also started a great earthshaking cause for revitalizing the nation in a new era.

zhs: 建设美丽中国的信心，为建设美丽中国做出我们应有的贡献，这两天，上海中共一大会址纪念馆
en: Make a due contribution to building a beautiful China in confidence, in the past days, the memorial of the 1st National Congress of the CPC in Shanghai

zhs: 迎来了大批参观群众，大家表示要紧随新一届党中央领导集体的脚步，学习党的历史，重温入党誓词。
en: has greeted a lot of visitors, who expressed their willing to follow the footsteps of the new collective leadership, study the history of the Party and go over the oath for joining the Party.

zhs: 因为我们以前来过，也在这宣誓过，看了这个习主席来了以后也特别振奋，好像人一下很鼓舞很鼓舞人士气的，所以我们老两口商量今天一定要再去一趟，再重温一下我们当时在这宣誓的过程，所以今天来了以后心情很激动的。
en: As we once came here and also took an oath, we were extremely motivated when we found President Xi also came here. It seemed to enhance the morale of the people. So, after discussing with each other, we decided to pay another visit so that we could review the procedure of making a vow here. I am so excited today.

zhs: 虽然我身体不太好，他说我拽着你也去。
en: Even I am not in good heath, but my husband promised to support me for the visit.

zhs: 我就跟着他一起来了，我们可以说
en: In this case, I come here together with him.

zhs: 就就从一进大学开始入党，就信念就非常的坚定，人总是心中还是要有这样的这样的想法，就是要坚定这样的信念，扎根在心里。
en: We joined the Party since the first year we entered the college. We have a firm belief. A person shall have such an idea and keep such a firm faith which shall bedeeply rooted in his heart.

zhs: 我觉得才能以后更好的不管是走上工作岗位还是怎么样，才能更好地为社会为国家服务。
en: Only in this way can we offer better service for the country after we start to work in an organization.

zhs: 在一大会址巨幅党旗前，习近平总书记带领其他常委同志集体重温入党誓词。
en: Before a huge Party flag at the site of the 1st National Congress, General Secretary Xi Jinping led other members of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau to go over the oath for joining the Party.

zhs: 总书记说：入党誓词记住并不难，难的是终身坚守。
en: The general secretary said, “it is not hard to remember the oath, but it is difficult to hold fast to it for life. "

zhs: 这句话，让当时在场的张黎明深有感触。
en: The saying made Zhang Liming on the spot deeply moved.

zhs: 一次入党是非常简单的，但是你要做一辈子按照这个做一辈子是非常非常困难的，是要做出巨大牺牲的，所以说我我觉得以习近平同志为核心的党中央，为我们做出了榜样，为我们
en: Joining the Party is very simple, but it is very difficult for you to conform to it for life. You need to make a great sacrifice. So, I feel that the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core has set a model for us,

zhs: 入党誓词是一面镜子，只有经常加以对照，以此修身正己锤炼党性，始终以实际行动诠释心中的信仰。
en: The oath is just a mirror, on which we shall check ourselves frequently for rectifying our shortcomings, tempering our Party spirit and interpreting the belief in our heart through our concrete actions.

zhs: 百折不挠的奋斗精神，立党为公忠诚为民的奉献精神党的十九大开启了党和国家事业的新征程，广大党员干部表示，要从党的光辉历史中
en: With the Indomitable fighting spirit, and the sacrifice spirit of dedication to work for the public and assuming power for the people, the 19th CPC National Congress has started a new journey of the course of the party and our country. All the Party members and cadres said that they would, from the brilliant history of the Party,

zhs: 汲取奋进的力量， 牢记共产党人的初心和使命，团结一心、苦干实干，真正把十九大精神学懂弄通
en: draw strength of struggling, bear the original aspiration and mission in mind, unit as one, work hard, and thoroughly comprehend the essence of the 19th CPC National Congress

zhs: 就在眼前更嗯感觉更有希望，那个动力更足，我们接下来的工作咧就是不断地学习，不断地去领会。
en: To witness the scene, I feel more promising and more energetic. Next, we shall keep on learning and understanding

zhs: 领会的同时还要去实践。
en: While comprehending, we also need to put it into practice.

zhs: 进入新时代，贯彻新思想，踏上新征程，我们一定坚决拥护。
en: After Entering a new era, to carry out the new guidelines and start a new journey, we must give our firm support

zhs: 以习近平同志为核心的党中央
en: to the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core

zhs: 我们相信
en: We believe

zhs: 十二届全国人大常委会第三十次会议二号下午在北京人民大会堂举行联组会议，结合审议全国人大常委会执法检查组
en: The 30th Meeting of the Standing Committee of the 12th National People's Congress held a joint group meeting at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on the afternoon of the 2th.

zhs: 张德江说，习近平总书记在十九大报告中指出，建设生态文明是中华民族永续发展的千年大计
en: Zhang Dejiang said, General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out in the report of the 19th CPC National Congress that building an ecological civilization is a major program of millennium for ensuring the lasting and sustainable development of the Chinese nation,

zhs: 强调要加强固体废弃物和垃圾处置。
en: highlighting that more efforts shall be made in improving solid waste and refuse disposal.

zhs: 我们要树立和践行绿水青山就是金山银山的理念
en: We shall build up and carry out the concept that beautiful scenery is the gold and silver mines.

zhs: 全面贯彻实施固体废物污染环境防治法，着力解决突出环境问题，坚决打赢污染防治攻坚战
en: Comprehensively implement the Law on the Prevention and Control of Pollution Caused by Solid Wastes, solve pressing problems related to environment, win the war against pollution prevention and control,

zhs: 加快推进绿色发展，推动形成人与自然和谐发展的现代化建设新格局，更好满足人民日益增长的优美生态环境需要。
en: accelerate the promotion of green development, move faster to create a new pattern of modernization featuring a harmonic development between man and nature so as to better meet the people's ever-growing material and cultural needs for a beautiful ecological environment.

zhs: 促进生态环境整体改善；要把防治固体废物污染作为实现绿色发展的有力抓手，促进形成节约资源和保护环境的空间格局、产业结构、生产方式、生活方式
en: Promote the overall improvement of ecological environment; we shall take prevention and control of solid waste pollution as a powerful measure of green development for promoting the formation of spatial pattern, industrial structure, mode of production and life style of resource conversation and environmental protection

zhs: 专题询问中，全国人大有关专门委员会委员和常委会委员分别就国务院将采取哪些措施依法防治固体废物污染
en: During the inquiry on special topics, the members of relevant speical committee and standing committee of the NPC made relevant inquiries on what kind of measures would be adopted by the State Council on preventing and controlling solid waste pollution,

zhs: 遏制增量、减少存量，切实打好污染防治攻坚战；
en: inhibiting the increment, reducing the existing pollution and pushing hard to ensure success in pollution prevention and control.

zhs: 将采取哪些措施强化危险废物处置和监管
en: What measures will be taken in strengthening the disposal and oversight of hazardous wastes

zhs: 如何提高工业固体废物资源综合利用水平；
en: How to improve the level of industrial solid waste resource comprehensive utilization

zhs: 如何统筹城乡生活垃圾处理，推动建筑垃圾变废为宝，加强宣传教育
en: How to coordinate the urban and rural domestic refuse disposal, promote the change of construction wastes into valuables and strengthen the publicity and education

zhs: 推进垃圾分类制度落地；
en: Push ahead with implementation of refuse classification system;

zhs: 将采取哪些措施进一步提高农业废弃物无害化处理和资源化利用率
en: What measures will be taken in further improving the agricultural waste harmless disposal and resource utilization

zhs: 对如何推动解决过度包装产生的固体废物污染，落实生产者回收处置责任，解决非法拆解处理废弃电子产品带来的环境污染问题
en: how to promote the settlement of solid waste polluton arisen from excessive packaging, assign the responsiblities of producers in recycling and disposal and solve the problem of environmental pollution brought about by illegal dismantling of discarded electronic products

zhs: 如何完善垃圾收费制度，采取有效措施加强医疗废物处理的监管等问题提出询问。
en: How to improve the waste charging system and take effective measures in strengthening the oversight of medical waste disposal.

zhs: 国务委员王勇和有关部门负责人到会应询。
en: The State Councilor Wang Yong and heads of relevant departments are present at the meeting upon request.

zhs: 王勇表示，国务院及有关部门将继续深入学习贯彻党的十九大精神
en: Wang Yong noted that the State Council and relevant departments will continue to thoroughly study and implement the spirit of the 19th CPC National Congress

zhs: 坚决打好污染防治攻坚战。
en: and push hard to ensure success in pollution prevention and control.

zhs: 坚定不移地依法推进固体废物污染防治工作，认真接受人大监督
en: Unswervingly press ahead with solid waste pollution prevention and control in accordance with the law, conscientiously accept the oversight of the NPC,

zhs: 切实解决突出环境问题
en: make specific arrangement to solve acute problems in environment

zhs: 国务院南水北调工程建设委员会第八次全体会议二号在北京召开，国务院副总理、国务院南水北调工程建设委员会主任张高丽
en: The Eighth Plenary Session of the South-to-North Water Diversion Project Construction Committee under the State Council was held on November 2 in Beijing. Zhang Gaoli, Vice Premier of the State Council and Director of the South-to-North Water Diversion Project Construction Committee under the State Council,

zhs: 进一步把思想认识行动统一到以习近平同志为核心的党中央重大决策部署上来，勇于担当、奋发有为
en: further unified the thought, recognition and action intothe major decisions and deploymentof the Party Central Committee with comrade Xi Jinping as the core, stressing that we should dare to shoulder our responsibilities and strive to make continuous progresses.

zhs: 在充分肯定南水北调工程工作取得的成绩后，张高丽强调，要继续扎实做好南水北调工程各项工作。
en: Aftera positive affirmation of the achievements in the work of the South-to-North Water Diversion Project, Zhang Gaoli stressed that we should continue to make great efforts in fulfilling the work of South-to-North Water Diversion Project in an all-round way

zhs: 要加强安全管理，保证工程平稳运行。
en: We should strengthen safety management to ensure the smooth operation of the project.

zhs: 要强化监测保护，确保调水水质稳定达标。要做好移民帮扶
en: We should strengthen to the supervision and protection of the water to ensure that the water quality is stable and up to standards. We should provide enough assistance to the immigrants,

zhs: 促进移民和当地群众同步实现小康。
en: and promote the immigrants toachieve a comfortable life with the local people synchronously

zhs: 要优化水量省际配置和调度，服务京津冀协同发展、长江经济带发展等重大战略
en: We should optimize the allocation and dispatching of water amount among provinces, to serve major strategies such as the coordinated development of Beijing, Tianjin and Hebei Province and the Yangtze River Economic Belt development, and

zhs: 保障好雄安新区建设发展用水需求。
en: to ensure the demand for water of the construction and development in Xiong'an New area.

zhs: 要建立良好的节水、调水和用水机制，推动工程充分发挥效益。
en: We should establish a good water-saving, water-diversion and water-using mechanism, and promote the project to give full play to its benefits

zhs: 要深入研究论证，有序推进后续工程建设准备工作。
en: We should promote the in-depth research and demonstration, and advance the preparations of the follow-up project in an orderly way.

zhs: 汪洋指出，南水北调工程建成运营并取得巨大成效，再次验证了我国的政治优势和制度优势。
en: Wang Yang pointed out that the South-to-North Water Diversion Project had made great achievement since its establishment and operation, which once again validated China’s political advantages and institutional superiorities.

zhs: 要认真总结工程建设和运营积累的好经验、好做法，加快建立适应新时代要求的管理体制和运行机制
en: We should carefully summarize the good experience and deeds accumulated in the construction and operation of the project, to speed up the establishment of a management system and a operation mechanism adapted to the requirements of the new era,

zhs: 把南水北调工程打造成清水走廊、绿色走廊，让工程长期造福人民、造福社会。
en: build the South-to-North Water Diversion Project into a corridor with clear water and greenness, and promote the project to benefit the people and society for the long run.

zhs: 要加大对库区移民的帮扶力度
en: We should increase the assistance for immigrants in the reservoir area,

zhs: 确保他们在全面建成小康社会中不掉队。
en: so that they won’t lag behind in the journey of building a moderately prosperous society in all respects.

zhs: 十九大代表、陆军第七十六集团军某特战旅作训科长魏巍，深入驻训营区，从回顾发展成就到推进国防和军队现代化
en: Wei Wei, a delegation to the 19th CPC National Congress and the Chief of the Combat Training Department of a war brigade of the No.76 Army Group, walked into the training camp and held his first propaganda among the officers and soldiers, during which he not only reviewed the achievements of development and the advancement of national defense and military modernization,

zhs: 从贯彻新时代强军思想到建设世界一流军队，为官兵进行了他的第一场宣讲。
en: but also called to carry out the thought of strengthening the army in the new era and building up the world’s leading military.

zhs: 习主席讲
en: President Xi pointed out that

zhs: 军队是要准备打仗的
en: a military is built to fight,

zhs: 一切工作都必须坚持战斗的标准
en: and our military must regard combat capability as the criterion to meet in all its work

zhs: 向能打仗，打胜仗聚焦。
en: and focus on how to win when it is called on.

zhs: 这次回来我就是要把主席的嘱托，传递到每名官兵的心中。
en: In the spirit of the 19th NPC National Congress, I came back to convey President Xi’s instructions to the hearts of every officer and soldier.

zhs: 在陆军第七十四集团军某旅黄草岭功臣连的微讲堂上十九大代表、两栖突击车车长王锐，结合十九大报告讲解的十二个新亮点
en: The twelve new spotlights derived from the 19th CPC National Congress report and explained by Wang Rui, a delegation to the 19th CPC National Congress and the Captain of the Amphibious Assault Vehicle, in the micro-lecture hall of Huangcaoling Meritorious Company of the No.74 Group Army,

zhs: 格外吸引大家的关注。
en: were particularly noteworthy.

zhs: 作为一名基层代表，我想就应该用战士的语言，最直白的的话去解读
en: As a representative of the grass-roots, I think we should interpret the spirit of the 19th CPC National Congress to the soldiers in the most straightforward language,

zhs: 帮助他们答疑解惑，让他们联系实际去理解，结合战位去落实。
en: help resolve their questions and doubts, guide them to comprehend the essence of the spirit based on reality, and implement the spirit into their battle stations.

zhs: 之前学习十九大报告的时候，很多东西虽然都知道
en: We have learned a great deal from the early study of the 19th CPC National Congress report,

zhs: 对于新时代自己的岗位任务有了更清楚的理解和认识。
en: and developed a clearer understanding and knowledge of our responsibilities in the new era.

zhs: 十九大代表海军东海舰队某基地岸导团营长温国良向刚入伍的新战士讲述报告中的新思想。
en: Wen Guoliang, the delegate to the 19th CPC National Congress and the commander of a ground-to-ship missile legion of the East China Sea Fleet explained to the new soldiers the new thoughts in the 19th CPC National Congress report.

zhs: 新使命、新目标
en: New mission, new goals

zhs: 与新兵交流学习心得、共话成长故事。
en: Exchanged learning experiences with the new soldiers and shared with them the growing-up stories.

zhs: 学习贯彻十九大精神，就是要争做勇担强军重任的新时代水兵
en: To study and implement the spirit of the 19th CPC National Congress is to become a New Age navy sailor that is ready to shoulder the important missions of building a strong army,

zhs: 为建成世界一流军队，奉献青春，为实现中国梦、强军梦贡献力量。
en: dedicate his youth and enthusiasm to building Chinese navy into the world’s leading military, and devote himself heart and soul to promoting the realization of the Chinese dream and the dream of building a powerful military.

zhs: 十九大代表，吉林省军区数据信息室助理工程师张燕兵，面对官兵提出的一个个问题
en: For the questions raised by the soldiers, Zhang Yanbing, the delegate to the 19th CPC National Congress and the assistant engineer of the Data Information Office of Jilin Military Region, said that

zhs: 不仅要把十九大的精神学习好、宣传好，更要用行动带动好，让基层官兵肩负起新时代青年官兵的责任与担当。
en: it was not only necessary to study and propagate the 19th CPC National Congress spirit well, but also important to put the spirit into action and motivate the officers and soldiers at the grassroots to shoulder their responsibilities in the new era.

zhs: 为帮助官兵学深悟透十九大精神
en: In order to help the officers and soldiers better understand the spirit of the 19th CPC National Congress,

zhs: 十九大代表、南部战区空军航空兵某团团长刘锐精心整理宣讲资料。
en: Liu Rui, the delegate to the 19th CPC National Congress and the regimental commander of an air force aviation region in the Southern Theater Command, have done a great deal of work.

zhs: 针对不同的群体认真准备多份宣讲提纲，为官兵解读十九大报告关键词，串讲十九大报告精髓要义
en: He carefully collated the propaganda materials, prepared multiple propaganda outlines for different groups, interpreted to the officers and soldiers the key words of the 19th CPC National Congress report, and construed the essences of the report in a coherent and systematic manner,

zhs: 不断深化学习理解。
en: so as to continuously reinforce their understanding of the essence and spirit of the report.

zhs: 习主席在十九大报告当中指出，军队是要准备打仗的，一切工作
en: President Xi pointed out that a military is built to fight, and our military must regard combat capability

zhs: 威尔士 AM 担心”像蠢蛋“
en: Welsh AMs worried about 'looking like muppets'

zhs: 有人提议，AM 应该将头衔改为 MWP（威尔士议会议员），这让好多 AM 大为震惊。
en: There is consternation among some AMs at a suggestion their title should change to MWPs (Member of the Welsh Parliament).

zhs: 之所以有人这样提议，是因为计划要将议会名称改为“威尔士议会”。
en: It has arisen because of plans to change the name of the assembly to the Welsh Parliament.

zhs: 政治界的 AM 担心这会惹人嘲笑。
en: AMs across the political spectrum are worried it could invite ridicule.

zhs: 一名工党 AM 表示，工党成员担心“这个名称与 Twp 和 Pwp 押韵”。
en: One Labour AM said his group was concerned "it rhymes with Twp and Pwp."

zhs: （非威尔士读者须知：在威尔士语中，twp 的意思为“愚蠢”，pwp 意思为“大便”。
en: For readers outside of Wales: In Welsh twp means daft and pwp means poo.

zhs: 一名民族党 AM 表示，整个民族党人员都“不满意“，建议换成其他名称。
en: A Plaid AM said the group as a whole was "not happy" and has suggested alternatives.

zhs: 一名威尔士保守党人表示，保守党对这次更名“持开放态度”，但指出，发音上很容易将 MWP 发成 Muppet 的音。
en: A Welsh Conservative said his group was "open minded" about the name change, but noted it was a short verbal hop from MWP to Muppet.

zhs: 在该语境下，威尔士字母 w 的发音类似于约克郡英语字母 u 的发音。
en: In this context The Welsh letter w is pronounced similarly to the Yorkshire English pronunciation of the letter u.

zhs: 议会委员会 (Assembly Commission) 目前正在对名称变更起草法律，他说：“关于委员会成员最终决定选择用什么名字，这是他们自己的事情。”
en: The Assembly Commission, which is currently drafting legislation to introduce the name changes, said: "The final decision on any descriptors of what Assembly Members are called will of course be a matter for the members themselves."

zhs: 《2017 年威尔士政府法案》规定，威尔士议会有更名的权力。
en: The Government of Wales Act 2017 gave the Welsh assembly the power to change its name.

zhs: 6 月，委员会公布了关于这些名称提议的公众咨询结果，普遍支持使用”威尔士议会“这一名称。
en: In June, the Commission published the results of a public consultation on the proposals which found broad support for calling the assembly a Welsh Parliament.

zhs: 关于 AM 的头衔问题，委员会赞倾向于 WMP（威尔士议会议员），但公众咨询结果中，支持率最高的是 MWP 。
en: On the matter of the AMs' title, the Commission favoured Welsh Parliament Members or WMPs, but the MWP option received the most support in a public consultation.

zhs: 显然，AM 建议采用其他名称，但会议主席 Elin Jones 感到头痛的是，迟迟达不成一致，因为他要在几周内提交名称变更的立法草案。
en: AMs are apparently suggesting alternative options, but the struggle to reach consensus could be a headache for the Presiding Officer, Elin Jones, who is expected to submit draft legislation on the changes within weeks.

zhs: 关于改革的立法还会纳入议会运作方式的其他变更内容，包括取消 AM 资格的规则和委员会制度的设计。
en: The legislation on the reforms will include other changes to the way the assembly works, including rules on disqualification of AMs and the design of the committee system.

zhs: AM 将在立法辩论时，对最终名称进行投票。
en: AMs will get the final vote on the question of what they should be called when they debate the legislation.

zhs: 马其顿就更改国名举行公投
en: Macedonians go to polls in referendum on changing country's name

zhs: 选民们将于周日进行投票，以表决是否将国名更改为“北马其顿共和国”。
en: Voters will vote Sunday on whether to change their country's name to the "Republic of North Macedonia."

zhs: 直接投票是为了解决马其顿与邻国希腊之间长达数十年的争端问题，希腊有一个省也叫马其顿。
en: The popular vote was set up in a bid to resolve a decades-long dispute with neighboring Greece, which has its own province called Macedonia.

zhs: 雅典方面一直坚称其北部邻国的名字意味着希腊对其领土具有合法权利，并多次拒绝马其顿加入欧盟 (EU) 和北大西洋公约组织 (NATO)。
en: Athens has long insisted that its northern neighbor's name represents a claim on its territory and has repeatedly objected to its membership bids for the EU and NATO.

zhs: 马其顿总统奥尔基·伊万诺夫 (Gjorge Ivanov) 是此次更名公民投票的反对者，他表示不会参与投票。
en: Macedonian President Gjorge Ivanov, an opponent of the plebiscite on the name change, has said he will disregard the vote.

zhs: 然而，包括总理佐兰·扎埃夫 (Zoran Zaev) 在内的公投支持者们认为，更名不过是加入欧盟 (EU) 和北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 所要付出的必然代价。
en: However, supporters of the referendum, including Prime Minister Zoran Zaev, argue that the name change is simply the price to pay to join the EU and NATO.

zhs: 哈萊姆区的教堂岌岌可危，圣马丁教堂的钟声陷入沉寂
en: The Bells of St. Martin's Fall Silent as Churches in Harlem Struggle

zhs: “历史上我曾经约谈过的老人们都说，每个角落都会有一家酒吧和一座教堂，”亚当斯 (Adams) 说到。
en: "Historically, the old people I've talked to say there was a bar and a church on every corner," Mr. Adams said.

zhs: “如今，这里既没有酒吧，也没有教堂。”
en: "Today, there's neither."

zhs: 他说酒吧的消失是情理之中的。
en: He said the disappearance of bars was understandable.

zhs: “如今，人们开始以不同的方式参与社交”，亚当斯表示。
en: "People socialize in a different way" nowadays, he said.

zhs: “酒吧不再是人们定期光顾的街区客厅。”
en: "Bars are no longer neighborhood living rooms where people go on a regular basis."

zhs: 至于教堂，他担心出售资产的资金并不会支撑到如领导人们预期的那样持久，“资金迟早会归零”。
en: As for churches, he worries that the money from selling assets will not last as long as leaders expect it to, "and sooner or later they'll be right back where they started."

zhs: 他补充道，教堂将被公寓大楼所取代，而公寓中住着的是那些不会帮助维护街区剩余避难所的人们。
en: Churches, he added, could be replaced by apartment buildings with condominiums filled with the kind of people who will not help the neighborhood's remaining sanctuaries.

zhs: “在这些建筑中购买公寓的绝大多数都将是白人”，他说道，“因此，这也将加速教堂的全面关闭，因为大多数搬进这些公寓的人们不太可能会成为教堂的成员”。
en: "The overwhelming majority of people who buy condominiums in these buildings will be white," he said, "and therefore will hasten the day that these churches close altogether because it is unlikely that most of these people who move into these condominiums will become members of these churches."

zhs: 这两座教堂均在圣马丁教堂建成十年后，哈萊姆区成为黑人都市（1870 年的都会社区）之前由白人会众建造。
en: Both churches were built by white congregations before Harlem became a black metropolis - Metropolitan Community in 1870, St. Martin's a decade later.

zhs: 最初的白人卫理公会会众于 20 世纪 30 年代迁出。
en: The original white Methodist congregation moved out in the 1930s.

zhs: 在附近做礼拜的一名黑人会众获得了这座建筑的所有权。
en: A black congregation that had been worshiping nearby took title to the building.

zhs: 在约翰·霍华德·约翰逊 (John Howard Johnson) 牧师的领导下，圣马丁教堂被一名黑人会众接管，约翰逊牧师曾领导一场抵制 125 街 (125 Street) 零售商的运动，125 街是哈萊姆区一条主要的购物街，但是拒绝雇用或提拔黑人。
en: St. Martin's was taken over by a black congregation under the Rev. John Howard Johnson, who led a boycott of retailers on 125th Street, a main street for shopping in Harlem, who resisted hiring or promoting blacks.

zhs: 1939 年的一场大火对建筑造成严重损毁，但是由于约翰逊教父的教区居民计划重建教堂，他们顺便委托制造了钟琴。
en: A fire in 1939 left the building badly damaged, but as Father Johnson's parishioners made plans to rebuild, they commissioned the carillon.

zhs: 约翰逊教父的儿子，圣马丁教堂的继承人大卫·约翰逊 (David Johnson) 牧师傲慢地将钟琴称为“穷人的铃声”。
en: The Rev. David Johnson, Father Johnson's son and successor at St. Martin's, proudly called the carillon "the poor people's bells."

zhs: 在七月曾演奏钟琴的专业人士却将其称为：“文化瑰宝”和“无可取代的历史性乐器”。
en: The expert who played the carillon in July called it something else: "A cultural treasure" and "an irreplaceable historical instrument."

zhs: 这位专业人士，密歇根大学的 Tiffany Ng 还指出，这是世界上第一台由黑人乐师演奏的钟琴，这位乐师名为 Dionisio A. Lind，18 年前搬到河滨教堂演奏更大的钟琴。
en: The expert, Tiffany Ng of the University of Michigan, also noted that it was the first carillon in the world to be played by a black musician, Dionisio A. Lind, who moved to the larger carillon at the Riverside Church 18 years ago.

zhs: 梅利韦瑟 (Merriweather) 称圣马丁教堂并没有找人取代他的位置。
en: Mr. Merriweather said that St. Martin's did not replace him.

zhs: 过去几个月圣马丁教堂发生的事情是一个有关建筑师和承包商的复杂故事，这些建筑师和承包商的其中一些是由教堂的俗世领导人带来的，另一些是由主教教区带来的。
en: What has played out at St. Martin's over the last few months has been a complicated tale of architects and contractors, some brought in by the lay leaders of the church, others by the Episcopal diocese.

zhs: 教区的管理机构（教区委员会，由俗世领导人组成）曾在七月时给教区写信，表示担心“教区试图将资本转嫁给教区委员会”，尽管教区委员并会没有参与雇用教区递送过来的建筑师和承包商。
en: The vestry - the parish's governing body, made up of lay leaders - wrote the diocese in July with concerns that the diocese "would seek to pass along the costs" to the vestry, even though the vestry had not been involved in hiring the architects and contractors the diocese sent in.

zhs: 一些教区居民抱怨称教区行事方面缺乏透明度。
en: Some parishioners complained of a lack of transparency on the diocese's part.

zhs: 加州一 13 岁男童在潜水捕捞龙虾时被鲨鱼咬伤
en: Shark injures 13-year-old on lobster dive in California

zhs: 官方表示，周六，加州龙虾捕捞季开幕当天，一名 13 岁男童在潜水捕龙虾时被鲨鱼袭击咬伤。
en: A shark attacked and injured a 13-year-old boy Saturday while he was diving for lobster in California on the opening day of lobster season, officials said.

zhs: 袭击于早上 7 点前发生在恩西尼塔斯 Beacon 海滩附近。
en: The attack occurred just before 7 a.m. near Beacon's Beach in Encinitas.

zhs: 乍得 哈梅尔 (Chad Hammel) 在圣地亚哥接受 KSWB 电视台采访时表示，周六早上，他和朋友们一同潜水，大概半小时后，听到一名男童大声呼救，于是一行人上前将他拖出水面。
en: Chad Hammel told KSWB-TV in San Diego he had been diving with friends for about half an hour Saturday morning when he heard the boy screaming for help and then paddled over with a group to help pull him out of the water.

zhs: 哈梅尔说，开始他以为男童是因为抓到龙虾太过兴奋，但后来他“意识到男童在大喊，‘我被咬了！
en: Hammel said at first he thought it was just excitement of catching a lobster, but then he "realized that he was yelling, 'I got bit!

zhs: 我被咬了！’
en: I got bit!'

zhs: 他的整个锁骨都被撕开了”，哈梅尔说他一到男童身边就注意到了。
en: His whole clavicle was ripped open," Hammel said he noticed once he got to the boy.

zhs: “我呼喊大家把他拉出水面：‘水里有鲨鱼！’”哈梅尔又说到。
en: "I yelled at everyone to get out of the water: 'There's a shark in the water!'" Hammel added.

zhs: 男孩被空运到圣地亚哥雷迪儿童医院 (Rady Children's Hospital)，目前情况危急。
en: The boy was airlifted to Rady Children's Hospital in San Diego where he is listed in critical condition.

zhs: 袭击事件中的鲨鱼种类尚不明确。
en: The species of shark responsible for the attack was unknown.

zhs: 救生员拉里·贾尔斯 (Larry Giles) 上尉在新闻发布会上表示，几周前在该地区发现了一条鲨鱼，但已确定不会对人类构成危险。
en: Lifeguard Capt. Larry Giles said at a media briefing that a shark had been spotted in the area a few weeks earlier, but it was determined not to be a dangerous species of shark.

zhs: 贾尔斯补充到，受害者的上半身受到创伤。
en: Giles added the victim sustained traumatic injuries to his upper torso area.

zhs: 出于调查和安全考虑，官方将 Casablad 的 Ponto 海滩至恩西尼塔斯的 Swami 海滩关闭 48 小时。
en: Officials shut down beach access from Ponto Beach in Casablad to Swami's in Ecinitas for 48 hours for investigation and safety purposes.

zhs: 贾尔斯表示该地区有 135 种以上的鲨鱼，但是大部分都不会对人类构成危险。
en: Giles noted that there are more than 135 shark species in the area, but most are not considered dangerous.

zhs: Sainsbury's计划进军英国美容市场
en: Sainsbury's plans push into UK beauty market

zhs: 塞恩斯伯里百货公司 (Sainsbury’s) 要采用博姿 (Boots)、Superdrug 和德本汉姆百货公司 (Debenhams) 的百货公司风格，开设配备专业助理的美容通道。
en: Sainsbury's is taking on Boots, Superdrug and Debenhams with department store-style beauty aisles staffed with specialist assistants.

zhs: 随着大量百货公司进军英国价值 28 亿英镑的美容市场，而且在时尚和家居用品销售回落期间，这一市场仍在持续增长而，将在全国 11 家商铺进行美容通道测试，如果测试成功，则将在明年推广到更多店铺。
en: As part of a substantial push into the UK's £2.8bn beauty market, which is continuing to grow while fashion and homeware sales fall back, the larger beauty aisles will be tested out in 11 stores around the country and taken to more stores next year if it proves a success.

zhs: 由于超市的电视机、微波炉和家居用品货架一度被起诉，超市决定投资美容产品，利用这些货架空间。
en: The investment in beauty comes as supermarkets hunt for ways to use up shelf space once sued for TVs, microwaves and homeware.

zhs: 塞恩斯伯里百货公司表示，将把美容产品的规模扩大一倍，推出 3000 多种产品，包括露华浓 (Revlon)、Essie、Tweezerman 和 Dr. PawPaw 等品牌。
en: Sainsbury's said it would be doubling the size of its beauty offering to up to 3,000 products, including brands such as Revlon, Essie, Tweezerman and Dr. PawPaw for the first time.

zhs: 欧莱雅 (L’oreal)、美宝莲 (Maybelline) 和伯特蜂 (Burt's Bees) 等现有品牌也将获得更大的空间，拥有与 Boots 等商店类似的品牌区域。
en: Existing ranges from L'Oreal, Maybelline and Burt's Bees will also get more space with branded areas similar to those found in shops like Boots.

zhs: 这家超市还重新推出了自己的精品化妆品系列，以使大多数产品都是纯素食产品——这是越来越多的年轻购物者的要求所在。
en: The supermarket is also relaunching its Boutique makeup range so that the majority of products are vegan-friendly - something increasingly demanded by younger shoppers.

zhs: 此外，香水零售商 Fragrance Shop 将在塞恩斯伯里的两家门店进行特许经营试营业。第一家上周在伦敦南部的克罗伊登 (Croydon) 开店，另一家将于今年年末，在伯明翰的 Selly Oak 开业。
en: In addition, perfume retailer the Fragrance Shop will be testing out concessions in two Sainsbury's stores, the first of which opened in Croydon, south London, last week while a second opens in Selly Oak, Birmingham, later this year.

zhs: 当前的主打趋势是网上购物，以及每天在当地便利店购买少量食品，这就意味着，超市必须采取更多措施，吸引人们前来光顾。
en: Online shopping and a shift towards buying small amounts of food daily at local convenience stores means supermarkets are having to do more to persuade people to visit.

zhs: 塞恩斯伯里百货公司首席执行官迈克·库普 (Mike Coupe) 表示，这家连锁超市会提供更多服务和非食品来反击折扣商阿尔迪 (Aldi) 和利德尔 (Lidl)，这些门店将越来越像百货商店。
en: Mike Coupe, the chief executive of Sainsbury's, has said the outlets will look increasingly like department stores as the supermarket chain tries to fight back against the discounters Aldi and Lidl with more services and non-food.

zhs: 自两年前收购这两家连锁店以来，塞恩斯伯里百货公司一直在数百家门店开设 Argos 门店，并引入了一些 Habitat。该公司表示，收购提振了杂货销售，带来了利润。
en: Sainsbury's has been putting Argos outlets in hundreds of stores and has also introduced a number of Habitats since it bought both chains two years ago, which it says has bolstered grocery sales and made the acquisitions more profitable.

zhs: 这家超市之前也曾尝试过改造美容和药房，但以失败告终。
en: The supermarket's previous attempt to revamp its beauty and pharmacy departments ended in failure.

zhs: 21 世纪初，塞恩斯伯里与博姿共同试运营了一家合资企业，但在就如何从博姿超市的药店中分取收入的问题上发生争执后，双方的合作宣告结束。
en: Sainsbury's tested a joint venture with Boots in the early 2000s, but the tie-up ended after a row over how to split the revenues from the chemist's stores in its supermarkets.

zhs: 三年前，塞恩斯伯里提出了新战略，将 281 家门店的药店业务，以 1.25 亿英镑卖给了 Lloyds Pharmacy 连锁药店的所有者 Celesio。
en: The new strategy comes after Sainsbury's sold its 281-store pharmacy business to Celesio, the owner of the Lloyds Pharmacy chain, for £125m, three years ago.

zhs: 该公司表示，Lloyds Pharmacy 将在四家门店增加一系列奢侈护肤品品牌，包括 La Roche-Posay 和 Vichy，故而会在该计划中发挥重要作用。
en: It said Lloyds would play a role in the plan, by adding an extended range of luxury skincare brands including La Roche-Posay and Vichy in four stores.

zhs: 塞恩斯伯里百货公司的商业总监保罗·米尔斯-希克斯 (Paul Mills-Hicks) 说道: “我们已经改变了美容通道的外观和氛围，为客户改善了环境。”
en: Paul Mills-Hicks, Sainsbury's commercial director, said: "We've transformed the look and feel of our beauty aisles to enhance the environment for our customers.

zhs: 我们还投资引入了受过特殊培训的同事，他们将在现场提供建议。
en: We've also invested in specially trained colleagues who will be on hand to offer advice.

zhs: 我们的一系列品牌都是为满足每一种需求而设计的，诱人的环境和便利的地理位置意味着我们现在是一个引人注目的美容目的地，将成为传统购物方式的一大挑战。
en: Our range of brands is designed to suit every need and the alluring environment and convenient locations mean we're now a compelling beauty destination which challenges the old way of shopping."

zhs: 在霍莉·威洛比 (Holly Willoughby) 退出 1100 万英镑的交易之后，彼得琼斯 (Peter Jones)“大为震怒”
en: Peter Jones 'furious' after Holly Willoughby pulls out of £11million deal

zhs: 电视节目主持人霍莉·威洛比 (Holly Willoughby) 退出 1100 万英镑的生活方式品牌业务交易，转而集中与 Marks and Spencer 与 ITV 签订的新合同，这让《龙穴》(Dragons Den) 明星彼得·琼斯 (Peter Jones) “大为震怒”
en: Dragons Den star Peter Jones left 'furious' after TV presenter Holly Willoughby pulls out of £11million deal with his lifestyle brand business to focus on her new contracts with Marks and Spencer and ITV

zhs: 威洛比没有时间投入到他们的家居服饰和配饰品牌 Truly。
en: Willoughby has no time for their homewear and accessories brand Truly.

zhs: 这对搭档的业务好比是 Gwyneth Paltrow 的 Goop 品牌。
en: The pair's business had been likened to Gwyneth Paltrow's Goop brand.

zhs: 这位 37 岁的《This Morning》节目主持人在 Instagram 宣布了自己要退出的决定。
en: This Morning presenter, 37, took to Instagram to announce she is leaving.

zhs: 霍莉·威洛比在最后一刻，退出了利润丰厚的生活方式品牌业务，转而投向与 Marks＆Spencer 和 ITV 签订的丰厚的新合同，这让《龙穴》明星彼得·琼斯大为震怒。
en: Holly Willoughby has left Dragons" Den star Peter Jones fuming by pulling out of their lucrative lifestyle brand business at the last minute - to focus on her own new bumper contracts with Marks & Spencer and ITV.

zhs: 消息人士称，电视金童在星期二于白金汉郡马洛商业帝国总部举行的一场紧张的会议上承认，她新达成了一项价值高达 150 万英镑的交易，听到这一消息后，琼斯“大为震怒”，因为这意味着她将没有足够的时间投入到他们合作的家居服饰品牌 Truly。
en: Sources say Jones was "furious" when TV's golden girl admitted during a tense meeting on Tuesday at the headquarters of his business empire in Marlow, Buckinghamshire, that her new deals - worth up to £1.5 million - meant she no longer had enough time to devote to their homewear and accessories brand Truly.

zhs: 这项业务好比是 Gwyneth Paltrow 的 Goop 品牌，原本有望让威洛比估计的 1100 万英镑的财产翻倍。
en: The business had been likened to Gwyneth Paltrow's Goop brand and was tipped to double Willoughby's estimated £11 million fortune.

zhs: 37 岁的威洛比在 Instagram 上宣布要退出 Truly 时，琼斯正乘坐飞机从英国出发前往他的一个度假屋的路上。
en: As Willoughby, 37, took to Instagram to announce she was leaving Truly, Jones jetted out of Britain to head for one of his holiday homes.

zhs: 一位消息人士说：“Truly 当时是霍莉的首要任务。
en: A source said: "Truly was by far the top of Holly's priorities.

zhs: 这将是她未来几十年的一项长期未来计划。
en: It was going to be her long-term future that would see her through the next couple of decades.

zhs: 她退出的决定让所有参与者都大为震惊。
en: Her decision to pull out left everyone involved absolutely stunned.

zhs: 没人相信星期二所发生的事情，因为眼看着就要投放市场了。
en: Nobody could believe what was happening on Tuesday, it was so close to the launch.

zhs: 马洛总部还有整整一仓库的货物等着出售呢。“
en: There is a warehouse full of goods at the Marlow HQ which are ready to be sold."

zhs: 专家认为，英国最具盈利潜能的《This Morning》主持人的退出，可能会给公司带来数百万美元的损失，因为公司对垫子、蜡烛到服装和家居用品等产品投入了巨额投资，此外，还可能进一步推迟市场投放的进度。
en: Experts believe the departure of the This Morning presenter, who is among Britain's most bankable stars, could cost the firm millions due to hefty investment in products ranging from cushions and candles to clothing and homewear, and the potential for further delays to its launch.

zhs: 这可能意味着一段长期友谊的结束。
en: And it could mean the end of a long friendship.

zhs: 如今已是三个孩子母亲的威洛比与丈夫丹·波尔文 (Dan Baldwin) 与琼斯和他的妻子 Tara Capp 已是十年的好友。
en: Mother-of-three Willoughby and husband Dan Baldwin have been close to Jones and his wife Tara Capp for ten years.

zhs: 威洛比与 Capp 在 2016 年成立了 Truly 品牌，52 岁的琼斯于 3 月份以董事的身份加入。
en: Willoughby set up Truly with Capp in 2016 and Jones, 52, joined as chairman in March.

zhs: 这两对夫妇总是一起度假，而且琼斯在波尔文的电视制作公司，拥有其 40％ 的股份。
en: The couples holiday together and Jones has a 40 per cent stake in Baldwin's TV production firm.

zhs: 威洛比将成为 M＆S 的品牌代言人，并将取代 Ant McPartlin 成为 ITV 的“我是名人 (I'm A Celebrity)”的主持人。
en: Willoughby is to become a brand ambassador for M&S and will replace Ant McPartlin as host of ITV's I'm A Celebrity.

zhs: 一位与 Jones 交往密切的消息人士昨晚表示，“对于他商务方面的事，我们不予评论务。”
en: A source close to Jones said last night "We wouldn't comment on his business affairs."

zhs: 郑重的会谈后，“我们相爱了”
en: Tough talk 'and then we fell in love'

zhs: 针对新闻媒体的批判言论，他玩笑地说道。有人觉得这“有失总统身份”，而且对朝鲜领导人评价过高。
en: He joked about criticism he would get from the news media for making a comment some would consider "unpresidential" and for being so positive about the North Korean leader.

zhs: 为什么特朗普总统要牺牲那么多？
en: Why has President Trump given up so much?

zhs: 特朗普模仿“新闻主播”的声音说道。
en: Trump said in his mock "news anchor" voice.

zhs: “我什么也没牺牲。”
en: "I didn't give up anything."

zhs: 他指出，6 月份，在新加坡首次举行了两国领导人会晤，特朗普称赞此举为实现朝鲜无核化的重要一步，现在，金正恩有意再次举行会晤。
en: He noted that Kim is interested in a second meeting after their initial meeting in Singapore in June was hailed by Trump as a big step toward denuclearization of North Korea.

zhs: 但无核化谈判陷入了僵局。
en: But denuclearization negotiations have stalled.

zhs: 自 6 月的新加坡峰会三个多月之后，朝鲜最高外交官李勇浩在周六举行的联合国大会上向世界领导人发表演讲，称朝鲜没有看到美国对朝鲜早期的裁军行动给予“相应的回应”。
en: More than three months after the June summit in Singapore, North Korea's top diplomat Ri Yong Ho told world leaders at the U.N. General Assembly Saturday that the North doesn't see a "corresponding response" from the U.S. to North Korea's early disarmament moves.

zhs: 他指出，美国反倒持续打压，实施制裁。
en: Instead, he noted, the U.S. is continuing sanctions aimed at keeping up pressure.

zhs: 特朗普在他的集会演讲中表现出乐观的态度。
en: Trump took a much more optimistic view in his rally speech.

zhs: 他说道，“我们跟朝鲜相处得很好。”
en: "We're doing great with North Korea," he said.

zhs: “要是我们跟朝鲜开战，
en: "We were going to war with North Korea.

zhs: 恐怕已有几百万人惨死了。
en: Millions of people would have been killed.

zhs: 现在，这关系就不错了。”
en: Now we have this great relationship."

zhs: 他说，改善与金正恩关系的工作取得了积极成果，火箭测试终止，人质成功得救，美军士兵遗骸落叶归根。
en: He said his efforts to improve relations with Kim have brought positive results - ending rocket tests, helping free hostages and getting the remains of American servicemen returned home.

zhs: 此外，他在谈论与金正恩的关系时，为自己特殊的方法辩解称，
en: And he defended his unusual approach in talking about relations with Kim.

zhs: “做总统很容易，但是，与其让外面的一万多人蜂拥而入这座挤满人的场地，我们宁愿让这里的 200 多人站在此处”，特朗普直接指着面前的人群说道。
en: "It's so easy to be presidential, but instead of having 10,000 people outside trying to get into this packed arena, we'd have about 200 people standing right there," Trump said, pointing at the crowd directly in front of him.

zhs: 印尼海啸和地震摧毁了一座岛屿，致使数百人死亡
en: Indonesia Tsunami and Quake Devastate an Island, Killing Hundreds

zhs: 龙目岛地震之后，国外非政府组织等机构被告知不需要他们的帮助。
en: In the aftermath of the Lombok earthquake, for instance, foreign nongovernmental organizations were told they were not needed.

zhs: 尽管龙目岛有超过 10% 的人口流离失所，但政府并没有宣布发生国家灾难，而国家灾难是启动国际援助的先决条件。
en: Even though more than 10 percent of Lombok's population had been dislocated, no national disaster was declared, a prerequisite for catalyzing international aid.

zhs: “遗憾的是，在很多情况下，他们很清楚不会请求国际援助，因此这对他们而言将是一个巨大的挑战”，Sumbung 女士说到。
en: "In many cases, unfortunately, they've been very clear that they're not requesting international assistance, so it's a bit challenging," Ms. Sumbung said.

zhs: 救助儿童会 (Save the Children) 组织一个小组前往巴鲁，但是目前还无法确定外籍工作人员能否进入现场工作。
en: While Save the Children is putting together a team to travel to Palu, it is not yet sure whether foreign staff can work on the ground.

zhs: 国家灾难机构发言人苏托波 (Sutopo) 表示，印尼官员们正在评估巴鲁的情况，以判断是否需要国际机构前来参与救援工作。
en: Mr. Sutopo, the national disaster agency spokesman, said Indonesian officials were assessing the situation in Palu to see whether international agencies would be allowed to contribute to the aid effort.

zhs: 明明知道印尼可能持续不断地遭遇地震，面对大自然的狂怒，印尼仍没有做好充分的准备。
en: Given the earth shaking that Indonesia constantly endures, the country remains woefully underprepared for nature's wrath.

zhs: 虽然亚齐已经搭建了海啸避难所，但其他海岸线并没有效仿为之。
en: While tsunami shelters have been built in Aceh, they are not a common sight on other coastlines.

zhs: 尽管海啸预警已经生效，但巴鲁明显缺乏海啸警报，这可能是造成人员伤亡的罪魁祸首。
en: The apparent lack of a tsunami warning siren in Palu, even though a warning had been in effect, is likely to have contributed to the loss of life.

zhs: 即使在最有利的情况下，在印尼众多岛屿之间来往也是很具挑战性的。
en: At the best of times, traveling between Indonesia's many islands is challenging.

zhs: 自然灾害致使物流变得更加艰难。
en: Natural disasters make logistics even more complicated.

zhs: 一艘原本停靠在龙目岛救治地震灾民的医疗船正在前往巴鲁，但是至少需要三天的时间才能抵达新的救灾现场。
en: A hospital ship that had been stationed in Lombok to treat earthquake victims is making its way to Palu, but it will take at least three days to reach the site of the new calamity.

zhs: 总统佐科·维多多 (Joko Widodo) 将改良印尼破旧的基础设施作为其竞选活动的核心内容，并且不惜花费大量资金修缮公路和铁路。
en: President Joko Widodo made improving Indonesia's tattered infrastructure a centerpiece of his election campaign, and he has lavished money on roads and railways.

zhs: 但是由于明年将面临重新选举，资金短缺问题一直困扰着佐科政府。
en: But funding shortfalls have plagued Mr. Joko's administration as he faces re-election next year.

zhs: 佐科也面临着印尼挥之不去的宗派紧张局势的压力，穆斯林大多数成员的信仰更加保守。
en: Mr. Joko is also facing pressure from lingering sectarian tensions in Indonesia, where members of the Muslim majority have embraced a more conservative form of the faith.

zhs: 基督教和穆斯林帮派在街头使用砍刀、弓箭和其他简陋武器斗殴，已造成 1,000 多人死亡，数万人流离失所。
en: More than 1,000 people were killed and tens of thousands dislocated from their homes as Christian and Muslim gangs battled on the streets, using machetes, bows and arrows, and other crude weapons.

zhs: 观看：利物浦队丹尼尔·斯图里奇 (Daniel Sturridge) 在对战切尔西队的比赛中将比分扳平
en: Watch: Liverpool's Daniel Sturridge dips deep equalizer vs. Chelsea

zhs: 周六，伦敦斯坦福桥球场，丹尼尔·斯图里奇 (Daniel Sturridge) 在第 89 分钟的进球挽救了利物浦在英超联赛中输给切尔西的局面。
en: Daniel Sturridge saved Liverpool from a Premier League loss to Chelsea with a score in the 89th minute on Saturday at Stamford Bridge in London.

zhs: 斯图里奇在距离切尔西队球门 30 码处接到了杰尔丹·沙奇里 (Xherdan Shaqiri) 的传球，当时他的球队以 1-0 落后。
en: Sturridge received a pass from Xherdan Shaqiri while about 30 yards out from the Chelsea goal with his team trailing 1-0.

zhs: 他把球轻轻传到左侧，然后向远门柱射门。
en: He tapped the ball to his left before scooping a shot toward the far post.

zhs: 球向球门右上角偏移时，在禁区上方飞得很高。
en: The attempt sailed high above the box as it drifted toward the right top corner of the net.

zhs: 最终越过跳起的凯帕·阿里萨巴拉加 (Kepa Arrizabalaga)，落入网中。
en: The ball eventually dropped over a leaping Kepa Arrizabalaga and fell into the net.

zhs: 接受 LiverpoolFC.com 采访时斯图里奇表示,“我只是想进入那个位置，控球，然后 Shaq 等球员将尽量向前推进，我只是尽可能地为自己创造可能”。
en: "It was just trying to get into that position, to get on the ball and players like Shaq always play it forward as much as possible, so I just tried to create myself as much time as possible," Sturridge told LiverpoolFC.com.

zhs: “我看到坎特走了过来，触了一下球，没想太多就射门了。”
en: "I saw Kante coming and took one touch and didn't think about it too much and just took the shot on."

zhs: 第 25 分钟由比利时球星埃登·阿扎尔 （Eden Hazard）进球后，切尔西中场以 1-0 暂时领先。
en: Chelsea led 1-0 at halftime after getting a score in the 25th minute from Belgian star Eden Hazard.

zhs: 在那场比赛中，这位蓝军前锋用脚跟将球传给了马特奥·科瓦西奇 (Mateo Kovacic)，然后在中场附近甩掉防守突入利物浦队的半场。
en: The Blues striker heeled a pass back to Mateo Kovacic on that play, before spinning off near midfield and sprinting into the Liverpool half.

zhs: 科瓦西奇在中场打了一个快速的传切配合。
en: Kovacic did a quick give-and-go at midfield.

zhs: 然后以一个漂亮的直传，将阿扎尔带入了禁区。
en: He then fired a beautiful through ball, leading Hazard into the box.

zhs: 阿扎尔超过防守，左脚射门越过利物浦队的阿利松·贝克尔 (Alisson Becker)，射入远门柱。
en: Hazard outran the defense and finished into the far post netting with a left footed shot past Liverpool's Alisson Becker.

zhs: 周三下午 3 点，利物浦队将在意大利那不勒斯的圣保罗球场 (Stadio San Paolo)，迎战欧洲冠军联赛 (Champions League) 小组赛中的对手那不勒斯队。
en: Liverpool battles Napoli in the group stage of the Champions League at 3 p.m. on Wednesday at Stadio San Paolo in Naples, Italy.

zhs: 切尔西队将于周四下午 3 点在伦敦的欧足联欧洲联赛 (UEFA Europa Leaguge) 中与维迪奥顿队碰面。
en: Chelsea faces Videoton in the UEFA Europa Leaguge at 3 p.m. on Thursday in London.

zhs: 印尼海啸造成的死亡人数已上升至 832 人
en: Death toll from Indonesia tsunami rises to 832

zhs: 印尼国家灾难管理局周日凌晨表示，印尼强震海啸造成的死亡人数已攀升至 832 人。
en: The death toll in Indonesia's earthquake and tsunami has climbed to 832, the country's disaster agency said early Sunday.

zhs: 管理局发言人 Sutopo Purwo Nugroho 在新闻发布会上介绍称，据报道，周五发生的 7.5 级地震，引发高达六米（20 英尺）的巨浪，造成建筑物倒塌，多人被困建筑废墟之中。
en: Many people were reported trapped in the rubble of buildings brought down in the 7.5 magnitude earthquake which struck Friday and triggered waves as high as 20 feet, agency spokesman Sutopo Purwo Nugroho told a news conference.

zhs: 人口数超过 38 万人帕卢市，一片废墟，满目尽是坍塌大楼的碎片。
en: The city of Palu, which has more than 380,000 people, was strewn with debris from collapsed buildings.

zhs: 32 岁男子因涉嫌谋杀女子致其死亡而被警方逮捕
en: Police arrest man, 32, on suspicion of murder after woman is stabbed to death

zhs: 今天上午，在默西塞德郡的伯肯黑德 (Birkenhead) 发现了一具女尸，警方对这起谋杀案开始展开调查。
en: A murder investigation has been launched after woman's body was found in Birkenhead, Merseyside this morning.

zhs: 死者为 44 岁女性，于上午 7 时 55 分在 John Street 的Grayson Mews 被人发现，身上有刺伤痕迹，涉案男子 32 岁，因涉嫌谋杀被捕。
en: The 44-year-old was found at 7.55am with stab wounds on Grayson Mews on John Street, with a 32-year-old man being arrested on suspicion of murder.

zhs: 警方呼吁该地区群众，踊跃提供线索。
en: Police have urged people in the area who saw or heard anything to come forward.

zhs: 侦探督察 Brian O'Hagan 说道：“调查还处于早期阶段，我呼吁伯肯黑德 John Street 附近群众，如有任何线索，请与我们联系。
en: Detective Inspector Brian O'Hagan said: 'The investigation is in the early stages but I would appeal to anyone who was in the vicinity of John Street in Birkenhead who saw or heard anything suspicious to contact us.

zhs: 同时，我呼吁所有人，特别是出租车司机，如果行车记录仪中捕捉到了什么线索，请与我们联系，你们掌握的信息，对我们的调查至关重要”。
en: I would also appeal to anyone, particularly taxi drivers, who may have captured anything on dashcam footage to contact us as they may have information which is vital to our investigation.'

zhs: 一名警方发言人证实，受害者为伯肯黑德当地人，尸体发现于一座住宅内。
en: A police spokesman has confirmed the woman whose body was found is local to Birkenhead and she was found inside a property.

zhs: 今天下午，有认识这位女士的朋友已经赶到现场询问，今天早上她是在哪里发现的。
en: This afternoon friends who believe they know the woman have arrived at the scene to ask questions about where she was found this morning.

zhs: 调查正在进行中，警方已表示，正在通知受害者的亲人。
en: Investigations are ongoing as police have said they are in the process of informing the victim's next of kin.

zhs: 住在 Grayson Mews 的一位出租车司机刚想回自己的公寓，却被警方告知，任何人不得进出大楼。
en: A taxi driver who lives in Grayson Mews has just tried to get back into his flat but is being told by police no one is allowed in or out of the building.

zhs: 弄清楚出了什么事情后，他哑口无言。
en: He was speechless when he discovered what happened.

zhs: 目前，居民已收到通知，还要等几个小时才能进入。
en: Residents are now being told it will be hours until they are allowed back in.

zhs: 一名警察对一男子称，整个地区都已划为犯罪现场。
en: A police officer was heard telling one man that the entire area is now being treated as a crime scene.

zhs: 一女子现场痛哭不已。
en: A woman appeared at the scene in tears.

zhs: 嘴里一直说着，“太惨了”。
en: She keeps repeating 'it's so awful'.

zhs: 下午 2 点，警戒线内停了两辆警车，警戒线外停着一辆面包车。
en: At 2pm two police vans were inside the cordon with another van just outside.

zhs: 多名警察站在警戒线内监视着公寓楼的情况。
en: A number of officers were stood inside the cordon monitoring the block of flats.

zhs: 任何知情人士，可以发送 DM 至 @MerPolCC，拨打 101 或匿名联系 Crimestoppers（电话号码 0800 555 111），引用 9 月 30 日的记录 247。
en: Anyone with information is asked to DM @MerPolCC, call 101 or contact Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111 quoting log 247 of 30th September.

zhs: 议会的克伦威尔雕像成为最后遭受“改写历史”争议的纪念碑
en: Parliament's statue of Cromwell becomes latest memorial hit by 'rewriting history' row

zhs: 克伦威尔狂热的清教徒追随者们曾对英国文化和宗教文物进行塔利班式的破坏，放逐可谓是应得的惩罚。
en: Its banishment would be poetic justice for his Taliban-like destruction of so many of England's cultural and religious artefacts carried out by his fanatical Puritan followers.

zhs: 但克伦威尔学会称克里克 (Crick) 的建议“极为愚蠢”且“试图改写历史”。
en: But the Cromwell Society described Mr Crick's suggestion as "folly" and "attempting to rewrite history."

zhs: 克伦威尔学会主席，约翰·金史密斯 (John Goldsmith) 表示：“目前在有关移除雕像的争论中，位于西敏宫外的奥利弗·克伦威尔 (Oliver Cromwell) 的雕像无疑会成为攻击目标。
en: John Goldsmith, chairman of the Cromwell Society, said: "It was inevitable in the present debate about the removal of statues that the figure of Oliver Cromwell outside the Palace of Westminster would become a target.

zhs: 英国内战的破坏偶像主义运动既不是克伦威尔指挥的，也不是克伦威尔发动的。
en: The iconoclasm of the English civil wars was neither ordered nor carried out by Cromwell.

zhs: 或许克伦威尔最大的错误就是成为其先人托马斯上个世纪的所作所为的牺牲品。
en: Perhaps the wrong Cromwell would be sacrificed for the actions of his ancestor Thomas in the previous century.

zhs: 威廉·哈默·托尔内克罗夫特 (William Hamo Thorneycroft) 爵士对克伦威尔的高调称赞很好地证明了 19 世纪的主张，也是很多人认为仍值得庆贺的克伦威尔史学的一部分。
en: Sir William Hamo Thorneycroft's magnificent representation of Cromwell is evidence of 19th century opinion and part of the historiography of a figure who many believe is still worth celebrating.

zhs: 金史密斯向《星期日电讯报》透露：“克伦威尔被很多人认为是国会抵抗外部压力（就他而言，也就是君主制）的捍卫者，如今这么认为的人可能会少于 19 世纪晚期。
en: Mr Goldsmith told The Sunday Telegraph: "Cromwell is regarded by many, perhaps more in the late 19th century than today, as a defender of parliament against external pressure, in his case of course the monarchy.

zhs: 这一表述是否完全准确，一直是历史争论的主题。
en: Whether that is a wholly accurate representation is the subject of continuing historical debate.

zhs: 但可以肯定的是，17 世纪中期的冲突影响了我们国家后来的发展，克伦威尔是一个因代表分裂的一方而获得认可的人物。
en: What is certain is that the conflict of the mid 17th century has shaped the subsequent development of our nation, and Cromwell is an individual recognisable figure who represents one side of that divide.

zhs: 他作为护国公所取得的成就也值得庆祝和纪念的。”
en: His achievements as Lord Protector are also worth celebrating and commemorating."

zhs: “杀人猪”将中国农户撕咬致死
en: Killer Pig Mauls Chinese Farmer to Death

zhs: 据当地媒体报道，在中国西南部地区的一家市场上，一位农户被一头猪袭击致死。
en: A farmer was attacked and killed by a pig in a market in southwest China, according to local media reports.

zhs: 据《南华早报》周六报道，在贵州省六盘水市一家市场的猪圈附近，一名袁姓男子被发现已经死亡，该男子动脉被割断，满身是血。
en: The man, identified only by his surname "Yuan," was found dead with a severed artery, covered in blood near a sty at the market in Liupanshui in Guizhou province, the South China Morning Post reported Sunday.

zhs: 2005 年 5 月 30 日，中国青海省西宁市一家养猪场的养猪户正准备给猪注射疫苗。
en: A pig farmer prepares to inject vaccines into pigs at a hoggery on May 30, 2005 in Xining of Qinghai Province, China.

zhs: 据报道，该养猪户及其堂兄周三从邻省云南赶到当地市场来售卖 15 头猪。
en: He had reportedly travelled with his cousin from the neighboring Yunnan province Wednesday to sell 15 pigs at the market.

zhs: 第二天早上，他的堂兄发现该养猪户已经死亡，并且临近猪舍的门开着。
en: The following morning, his cousin found him dead, and discovered a door to a neighbouring pig sty open.

zhs: 他介绍称，那间猪圈里有一头体型较大的公猪，嘴里满是鲜血。
en: He said that in the sty was a large male pig with blood on its mouth.

zhs: 据报道，经法医鉴定证实，那只 550 磅的肥猪将该农民袭击致死。
en: A forensic examination confirmed that the 550 pound hog had mauled the farmer to death, according to the report.

zhs: 援引《贵阳晚间新闻》消息，“我堂弟的腿部血肉模糊，惨不忍睹”，吴姓堂兄说到。
en: "My cousin's legs were bloody and mangled," the cousin, referred to by his surname "Wu," said, as quoted by the Guiyang Evening News.

zhs: 监控录像显示，袁姓男子于周四早上 4：40 分进入市场喂猪。
en: Security camera footage showed Yuan entering the market at 4.40 am Thursday to feed his pigs.

zhs: 而他的尸体在大约一小时之后被发现。
en: His body was found about an hour later.

zhs: 但是致其死亡的肥猪既不属于袁姓男子也不属于其堂兄。
en: The animal who killed the man did not belong to Yuan or his cousin.

zhs: 市场管理员向《晚间新闻》透露，这只肥猪已经被锁了起来，防止其再次攻击他人，同时警方正在现场收集证据。
en: A market manager told the Evening News that the pig had been locked away to prevent it attacking anyone else, while police gathered evidence at the scene.

zhs: 据报道，袁姓男子的家人和市场当局正在协商其死亡赔偿问题。
en: Yuan's family and market authorities are reportedly negotiating compensation for his death.

zhs: 尽管较为罕见，但之前也曾报道过猪攻击人类的事件。
en: Though rare, cases of pigs attacking humans have been recorded before.

zhs: 2016 年，在马萨诸塞州的一家农场，一头猪攻击了一名妇女和她的丈夫，致使二人受重伤。
en: In 2016, a pig attacked a woman and her husband at their farm in Massachusetts, leaving the man with critical injuries.

zhs: 十年前，一只 650 磅的肥猪将威尔士一名农户按在拖拉机上，直至他的妻子赶来把这只牲畜吓跑。
en: Ten years previously, a 650 pound pig pinned a Welsh farmer to his tractor until his wife scared the animal away.

zhs: 2012 年，俄勒冈州的一名农户被自己的猪吞掉，马尼托巴湖的一名农户向加拿大广播公司新闻网 (CBC News) 透露称，猪通常不具有攻击性，但是血液的味道可以起到“触发剂”的作用。
en: After an Oregon farmer was eaten by his pigs in 2012, one Manitoba farmer told CBC News that pigs are not normally aggressive but the taste of blood can act as a "trigger."

zhs: “它们只是喜欢嬉戏打闹。
en: "They're just being playful.

zhs: 它们像孩子一样，充满好奇......它们并没有想伤害你。
en: They're nippers, very inquisitive ... they aren't out to hurt you.

zhs: 你只需要给予它们适当的尊重”，他说到。
en: You just have to pay them the right amount of respect," he said.

zhs: 飓风残余“罗莎”将继续为美国西南部带来大范围暴雨
en: Hurricane Rosa's remnants to bring widespread heavy rain to southwest US

zhs: 飓风"罗莎" (Rosa) 继续向墨西哥北海岸移动，如预报所示，在抵达这块凉爽的海域后，风势有所减弱。
en: As forecast, Hurricane Rosa is weakening as it moves over the cooler waters of the northern coast of Mexico.

zhs: 但预计在未来几天时间，罗莎还会给墨西哥北部及美国西南部带来大范围的暴雨和闪洪。
en: However, Rosa will bring flooding rains across northern Mexico and the southwest U.S. over the coming days.

zhs: 周日东部时间早上 5 点，“罗莎”的中心位于墨西哥 Punta Eugenia 西南 385 英里，风速为 85 英里/小时，属于 1 级飓风。
en: Rosa had winds of 85 mph, a Category 1 Hurricane, as of 5 a.m. Eastern time Sunday, and was located 385 miles southwest of Punta Eugenia, Mexico.

zhs: 预计“罗莎”将于周日继续北上。
en: Rosa is expected to move north on Sunday.

zhs: 与此同时，太平洋上开始形成低谷，向东移向美国西海岸。“罗莎”将于周一形成热带风暴，靠近下加利福尼亚半岛，届时，深层热带湿气将向北进军美国西南部。
en: Meanwhile, a trough is beginning to take shape over the Pacific Ocean and move east toward the West Coast of the U.S. As Rosa approaches the Baja California peninsula on Monday as a tropical storm it will begin to push deep tropical moisture northward into the southwest U.S.

zhs: 周一，“罗莎”将为墨西哥部分地区带来 10 英寸的降雨量。
en: Rosa will bring up to 10 inches of rain in parts of Mexico on Monday.

zhs: 之后，热带湿气与即将到来的波谷相互作用，将在未来几天内，在西南地区造成大范围强降雨。
en: Then, tropical moisture interacting with the approaching trough will create widespread heavy rainfall in the Southwest over the coming days.

zhs: 就当地而言，1 至 4 英寸的降雨量便会造成洪水泛滥、泥石流，甚至可能导致沙漠发生山体滑坡。
en: Locally, 1 to 4 inches of rain will cause dangerous flash flooding, debris flows and possibility landslides in the desert.

zhs: 深层热带湿气的影响，将使降雨量达到每小时 2 至 3 英寸的高度，特别是在内华达州南部和亚利桑那州的部分地区。
en: Deep tropical moisture will cause rainfall rates to approach 2 to 3 inches per hour in spots, especially in parts of southern Nevada and Arizona.

zhs: 预计西南部分地区的降雨量将达 2 至 4 英寸，特别是在亚利桑那州的大部分地区。
en: As much as 2 to 4 inches of rain is expected in parts of the Southwest, especially over much of Arizona.

zhs: 由于热带雨具有分散性，伴随条件的快速恶化，可能会出现洪水泛滥。
en: Flash flooding is possible with rapidly deteriorating conditions due to the scattered nature of tropical rain.

zhs: 由于热带降雨的威胁，沙漠冒险活动将十分危险。
en: It would be extremely ill advised to venture out into the desert on foot with the threat of tropical rainfall.

zhs: 大雨可能导致峡谷形成湍急的河流，雷雨会带来局部阵风和飞尘。
en: Heavy rain could cause canyons to become raging rivers and thunderstorms will bring locally gusty winds and blowing dust.

zhs: 即将抵达的波谷，将给南加州海岸的部分地区带来局部大雨。
en: The approaching trough will bring some locally heavy rain to parts of the Southern California coastline.

zhs: 降雨总量可能会超过半英寸，这可能会导致轻微泥石流和道路打滑。
en: Rainfall totals of over half an inch are possible, which could cause minor debris flows and slick roadways.

zhs: 这将是该地区进入雨季以来的第一场降雨。
en: This would be the region's first rainfall of their wet season.

zhs: 周日晚间及周一早上，亚利桑那州将迎来分散性热带阵雨，之后，周一晚间及周二的降雨范围将扩大。
en: Some scattered tropical rain showers will begin to approach Arizona late Sunday and early Monday, before the rain becomes more widespread late Monday and Tuesday.

zhs: 大雨将在周二蔓延到 Four Corners，并将一直持续到周三。
en: Heavy rain will spread into the Four Corners on Tuesday and last through Wednesday.

zhs: 由于北极变冷，而热带地区仍然相当温暖，十月，美国各地的温度将经历剧烈波动。
en: October can see some intense temperature swings across the U.S. as the Arctic gets cooler, but the tropics remain quite warm.

zhs: 这种情况有时会导致短距离内，温度发生剧烈变化。
en: Sometimes this leads to dramatic changes in temperature over short distances.

zhs: 周日，美国中部便会出现巨大温差。
en: There is a great example of dramatic temperature differences through the central U.S. on Sunday.

zhs: 密苏里州的堪萨斯城和内布拉斯加州的奥马哈之间，以及爱荷华州的圣路易斯和得梅因之间的温差将达到接近 20 度。
en: There is nearly a 20-degree temperature difference between Kansas City, Missouri, and Omaha, Nebraska, and between St. Louis and Des Moines, Iowa.

zhs: 接下来的几天里，将再次迎来挥之不去的暑热，范围将扩大。
en: Over the next few days, lingering summer warmth will try to build and expand again.

zhs: 预计美国中部和东部的大部分地区将在 10 月份开始迎来暑热，从南部平原到东北部分地区，大范围温度将达到 80 华氏度（约 27 摄氏度）。
en: Much of the central and eastern U.S. is expected to see a warm start to October with widespread 80s from the Southern Plains to parts of the Northeast.
