zhs: 纽约市周二气温也可能达到 80 华氏度（约 27 摄氏度），与平均水平相比，将高出约 10 华氏度。
en: New York City could reach 80 degrees on Tuesday, which would be approximately 10 degrees above average.

zhs: 长期气候预测显示，截至 10 月上半月，美国东部的气温高于平均水平。
en: Our long term climate forecast is indicating high chances for above-average temperatures for the eastern U.S. through the first half of October.

zhs: 超过 2000 万人观看 Brett Kavanaugh 听证会
en: More than 20 million people watched Brett Kavanaugh hearing

zhs: 周四，最高法院候选人布雷特·卡瓦诺 (Brett Kavanaugh) 与指控其在 20 世纪 80 年代对自己进行过性侵的女人克里斯蒂娜·布拉西·福特 (Christine Blasey Ford) 的听证会在六个电视网络上播出，引来超过 2000 万人观看。
en: More than 20 million people watched Thursday's gripping testimony by Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh and the woman who accused him of a sexual assault that allegedly occurred in the 1980s, Christine Blasey Ford, on six television networks.

zhs: 与此同时，政治僵局仍在继续，广播公司打乱了周五最后转折的常规节目：亚利桑那州参议员杰夫·弗莱克 (Jeff Flake) 答应会要求 FBI 对指控进行为期一周的调查。
en: Meanwhile, the political standoff continued, with broadcasters interrupting regular programming for Friday's last-minute twist: an agreement engineered by Arizona Sen. Jeff Flake for the FBI to conduct a one-week investigation of the charges.

zhs: 福特向参议院司法委员会介绍称，自己百分百肯定卡瓦诺在高中派对上喝醉后，摸自己的身体，想脱掉她的衣服。
en: Ford told the Senate Judiciary Committee that she's 100 percent certain that Kavanaugh groped her drunkenly and tried to take off her clothes at a high school party.

zhs: 卡瓦诺则慷慨激昂地回应称，他百分百肯定没有发生过这种情事。
en: Kavanaugh, in impassioned testimony, said he's 100 percent certain that it didn't happen.

zhs: 尼尔森公司上周五报道，可能会有超过 2040 万人观看这场听证会。
en: It's likely that more than the 20.4 million people reported by Nielsen on Friday watched it.

zhs: 该公司正在计算 CBS、ABC、NBC、CNN、福克斯新闻频道和、MSNBC、的平均收视率。
en: The company was counting average viewership on CBS, ABC, NBC, CNN, Fox News Channel and MSNBC.

zhs: 其他同时播出了这场听证会情况的网络的收视数据尚未获得，包括 PBS、C-SPAN 和 Fox Business Network。
en: Figures weren't immediately available for other networks that showed it, including PBS, C-SPAN and the Fox Business Network.

zhs: 尼尔森公司在统计办公室观看节目人数方面，时常会遇到一些麻烦。
en: And Nielsen usually has some trouble measuring people who watch in offices.

zhs: 客观来看，这个数字好比季后赛足球比赛或奥斯卡奖的观众规模。
en: To put that in perspective, that's an audience size similar to that for a playoff football game or the Academy Awards.

zhs: 尼尔森表示，福克斯新闻频道在听证会当天的全天收视人数达 569 万，力压其他网络媒体。福克斯新闻频道的观点主持人是任命卡瓦诺的有力支持者。
en: Fox News Channel, whose opinion hosts have strongly backed Kavanaugh's appointment, led all networks with an average of 5.69 million viewers during the all-day hearing, Nielsen said.

zhs: ABC 位居其后，收视人数为 326 万。
en: ABC was second with 3.26 million viewers.

zhs: 尼尔森统计，CBS 的收视人数为 310 万，NBC 为 294 万，MSNBC 为 289 万，CNN 为 252 万。
en: CBS had 3.1 million, NBC had 2.94 million, MSNBC had 2.89 million and CNN had 2.52 million, Nielsen said.

zhs: 听证会结束后，关注度仍居高不下。
en: Interest remained high after the hearing.

zhs: 弗莱克 成为了周五节目的核心人物。
en: Flake was the central figure in Friday's drama.

zhs: 先前，这位温和的共和党人，在办公室发表声明表示他将投票支持卡瓦诺。周五早上，他在登上电梯前往司法委员会听证会时，被 CNN 和 CBS 的摄像机拍摄到，抗议者对其开口大骂。
en: After the moderate Republican's office issued a statement that he would be voting in favor of Kavanaugh, he was caught be CNN and CBS cameras Friday morning being shouted at by protesters as he tried to ride an elevator to a Judiciary Committee hearing.

zhs: CNN 现场直播中看到，他在被谴责期间，目光低垂，沉默不语地站了几分钟。
en: He stood with eyes downcast for several minutes as he was berated, televised live on CNN.

zhs: 一位女人说道：“我就正在你的面前。”
en: "I'm standing right here in front of you," one woman said.

zhs: “你觉得他对国人所说的是事实吗？”
en: "Do you think he's telling the truth to the country?

zhs: “你大权在握，而这么多的女性却无能为力。”
en: He was told, "you have power when so many women are powerless.""

zhs: 在电梯关闭之前，弗莱克称，他的办公室发表了一份声明，自己将在委员会听证会上发表更多言论。
en: Flake said that his office had issued a statement and said, before the elevator closed, that he would have more to say at the committee hearing.

zhs: 有线电视和广播网络都在直播后续的情况，司法委员会将投票将卡瓦诺的提名，送往参议院进行全体投票。
en: The cable and broadcast networks were all covering live hours later, when the Judiciary Committee was to vote to advance Kavanaugh's nomination to the full Senate for a vote.

zhs: 但弗莱克表示，只有 FBI 在下周对涉及该候选人性侵的指控做进一步调查的情况下，他才会举行投票。而少数民主党也人一直在敦促对其进行进一步调查。
en: But Flake said he would only do so with the understanding that the FBI would look into the allegations against the nominee for the next week, which minority Democrats have been urging.

zhs: 在与朋友民主党参议员克里斯·库恩 (Chris Coons) 的对话后，弗拉克在一定程度上对此深信不疑。
en: Flake was convinced in part by conversations with his friend, Democratic Sen. Chris Coons.

zhs: 在与库恩和几位参议员的对话后，弗拉克作出了决定。
en: After a conversation with Coons and several senators afterwards, Flake made his decision.

zhs: 弗莱克的选择力度很大，因为显然，如果不进行调查，共和党人是不会投选票批准卡瓦诺的。
en: Flake's choice had power, because it was evident Republicans would not have the votes to approve Kavanaugh without the investigation.

zhs: 特朗普已经向联邦调查局签发命令对卡瓦诺法官进行补充调查。
en: President Trump has opened an FBI investigation into the allegations against Kavanaugh.

zhs: 英国首相特雷莎·梅指责脱欧问题的评论家们“玩政治游戏”
en: British PM May accuses critics of 'playing politics' over Brexit

zhs: 英国首相特雷莎·梅 (Theresa May) 在接受《星期日泰晤士报》采访时，指责其脱欧计划的评论家们对英国的未来“玩政治游戏”，损害国家利益。
en: Prime Minister Theresa May accused critics of her plans to leave the European Union of "playing politics" with Britain's future and undermining the national interest in an interview with the Sunday Times newspaper.

zhs: 英国首相特蕾莎·梅于 2018 年 9 月 29 日抵达英国伯明翰参加保守党会议。
en: Britain's Prime Minister Theresa May arrives for the Conservative Party Conference in Birmingham, Britain, September 29, 2018.

zhs: 在该报头版的另一则采访中，前英国外交大臣鲍里斯·约翰逊 (Boris Johnson) 对其所谓的脱欧契克斯计划进行了强烈抨击，并表示，英国和欧盟应该彼此向对方征收关税的这一提议“实属荒谬”。
en: In another interview next to the one with her on the newspaper's front page, her former foreign minister Boris Johnson pressed his attack of her so-called Chequers plan for Brexit, saying a proposal that Britain and the EU should collect each other's tariffs was "entirely preposterous."

zhs: Wayde Sims 枪杀案：警方抓捕路易斯安那州立大学球员枪杀案嫌疑人 Dyteon Simpson
en: Wayde Sims shooting: Police arrest suspect Dyteon Simpson in LSU player's death

zhs: 警方已经路易斯安那州立大学 20 岁的篮球运动员 Wayde Sims 枪杀案嫌疑人抓捕归案。
en: Police have arrested a suspect in the fatal shooting death of Wayde Sims, a 20-year-old basketball player at LSU.

zhs: 巴吞鲁日警察局 (Baton Rouge Police Department) 称，20 岁的 Dyteon Simpson 因二级谋杀罪被捕入狱。
en: Dyteon Simpson, 20, has been arrested and booked into prison on a second-degree murder charge, the Baton Rouge Police Department said.

zhs: 警方发布了 Sims 与 Simpson 两人打斗的视频，警方称 Sims 在打斗中，甩丢了眼镜。
en: Officials released video of the confrontation between Sims and Simpson, and police said Sims lost his glasses during the fight.

zhs: CBS 附属机构 WAFB 报道称，警方在现场找到了这副眼镜，称在上面找到了 Simpson 的 DNA。
en: Police recovered the glasses from the scene and said they found Simpson's DNA on them, CBS affiliate WAFB reports.

zhs: 在审问 Simpson 后，警方称 Simpson 对射杀了 Wayde 一事供认不讳。
en: After questioning Simpson, police said he admitted to fatally shooting Wayde.

zhs: Advocate 报道称，其身价可达 350,000 美元。
en: His bond has been set at $350,000, the Advocate reports.

zhs: East Baton Rouge Parish Coroner's Office （东巴吞鲁日县验尸管理局）周五发布了一份初步报告，称死亡原因为头部受到的枪伤。
en: The East Baton Rouge Parish Coroner's Office released a preliminary report Friday, saying the cause of death is a gunshot wound to the head into the neck.

zhs: 警局向协助调查，最终成功逮捕逃犯的路易斯安那州警局逃犯特遣部队 (Louisiana State Police fugitive task force)、州警察犯罪实验室、南方大学警局和地区公民表示感谢。
en: The department is crediting the Louisiana State Police fugitive task force, the state police crime lab, Southern University police and area citizens in assisting in the investigation leading to the arrest.

zhs: 路易斯安那州立大学体育指导员 Joe Alleva 向地区执法部门表示了感谢，赞扬该部门“工作勤勉，正义凛然”。
en: LSU athletic director Joe Alleva thanked area law enforcement for its "diligence and pursuit of justice."

zhs: Sims 享年 20 岁。
en: Sims was 20 years old.

zhs: Sims 身高 6 英尺 6 英寸（1.98 米），担任前锋，在巴吞鲁日长大，他的父亲 Wayne 也曾是路易斯安那州立大学篮球队的一员。
en: The 6-foot-6 forward grew up in Baton Rouge, where his father, Wayne, also played basketball for LSU.

zhs: 上个赛季，他场均得到 5.6 分，2.6 个篮板。
en: He averaged 5.6 points and 2.6 rebounds a game last season.

zhs: 周五早上，路易斯安那州立大学篮球队主教练 Will Wade 表示，球队对 Wayde 的离世，“伤心不已”，“难以接受”。
en: On Friday morning, LSU basketball coach Will Wade said the team is "devastated" and "in shock" by Wayde's death.

zhs: Wade 称，“这是我们最不愿意看到的结局。“
en: "This is what you worry about at all times," Wade said.

zhs: 墨西哥城火山喷发
en: Volcano spews ash on Mexico City

zhs: 波波卡特佩特火山爆发，喷出的灰烬弥漫到了墨西哥首都南部的街区。
en: Ash spewing from the Popocatepetl volcano has reached the southern neighborhoods of Mexico's capital.

zhs: 墨西哥全国防灾中心周六 24 小时内记录冒烟 183 次，随后向墨西哥人民发出警告，在火山口活动后，远离火山。
en: The National Center for Disaster Prevention warned Mexicans on Saturday to stay away from the volcano after activity picked up in the crater and it registered 183 emissions of gas and ash over 24 hours.

zhs: 防灾中心对多次发出的隆隆声和轻微地震进行监测。
en: The center was monitoring multiple rumblings and tremors.

zhs: 社交媒体上的图片显示，墨西哥城附近的霍奇米尔科，汽车挡风玻璃上蒙上了一层灰烬。
en: Images on social media showed thin layers of ash coating car windshields in neighborhoods of Mexico City such as Xochimilco.

zhs: 地球物理学家注意到，自 2017 年 9 月在墨西哥中部发生的 7.1 级地震以来，位于首都东南 45 英里（72 公里）的火山活动增加。
en: Geophysicists have noticed an increase in activity at the volcano that sits 45 miles (72 kilometers) southeast of the capital since a 7.1-magnitude earthquake rocked central Mexico in September 2017.

zhs: 这座火山又称“烟峰”，自 1994 年开始进入活动期。
en: The volcano known as "Don Goyo" has been active since 1994.

zhs: 加泰罗尼亚独立公投周年纪念前夕，警方与分离主义者发生冲突
en: Police clash with Catalan separatists ahead of independence vote anniversary

zhs: 周六，数千人加入反示威游行，以纪念加泰罗尼亚两极化分裂公投一周年，支持独立的抗议者们与防暴警察发生冲突，随后六人在巴塞罗那被捕。
en: Six people were arrested in Barcelona on Saturday after pro-independence protesters clashed with riot police, and as thousands joined rival demonstrations to mark the first anniversary of Catalonia's polarizing vote on secession.

zhs: 一群蒙面的支持分离主义者向防暴警察投掷鸡蛋和粉末涂料，导致往日挤满游客的街道上尘土遮天，随后被防暴警察拦下。
en: A group of masked pro-separatists held back by riot police pelted them with eggs and hurled powder paint, creating dark clouds of dust in streets that would usually be thronged with tourists.

zhs: 当天晚些时候还发生了混战，警察用警棍遏制了这场动乱。
en: Scuffles also broke out later in the day with police using their batons to contain the fighting.

zhs: 高呼“决不忘记，决不原谅”的支持独立派，与高呼“西班牙万岁”的主张统一的抗议者们对峙长达数小时。
en: Over several hours pro-independence groups chanting "No forgetting, no forgiveness" faced off with unionist protesters shouting, "Long live Spain."

zhs: 据当地媒体报道，有十四人因在抗议活动中受轻伤而接受治疗。
en: Fourteen people received treatment for minor injuries received in the protests, local press reported.

zhs: 去年 10 月 1 日的公投在马德里被视为非法行为，一年后，在这个倾向独立的地区，局势依然高度紧张，但加泰罗尼亚分离主义者却在举行庆祝活动。
en: Tensions remain high in the independence-minded region a year after the October 1 referendum deemed illegal by Madrid but celebrated by separatist Catalans.

zhs: 绝大多数选民选择独立，尽管如此，投票率依然很低，因为大多数反对分裂的人士拒绝投票。
en: Voters chose overwhelmingly to become independent, though turnout was low with those against secession largely boycotting the vote.

zhs: 据加泰罗尼亚当局表示，去年警方试图阻止该地区各投票站相继进行的投票，引发剧烈冲突，导致近 1000 人受伤。
en: According to Catalan authorities almost 1000 people were injured last year after police tried to stop the vote going ahead at polling stations across the region in violent clashes.

zhs: 周五晚上，支持独立派集体露营，阻止示威游行，支持国家警察的行动。
en: Pro-independence groups had camped out overnight on Friday to prevent a demonstration in support of the national police.

zhs: 示威游行仍在继续，但却不得不采取其他途径。
en: The demonstration went ahead but was forced to take a different route.

zhs: 与妻子一同参加此次分离主义者抗议活动的纳尔奇斯·特梅斯 (Narcis Termes)，是一名 68 岁的电工，他表示对加泰罗尼亚获得独立不再抱有任何希望。
en: Narcis Termes, 68, an electrician attending the separatist protest with his wife said he was no longer hopeful about the prospects of Catalonia gaining independence.

zhs: “去年，我们经历了人生中最美好的一段时光。
en: "Last year we lived through one of our best moments.

zhs: 我的父母因为能够参与投票而高兴得哭了，但现在我们却陷入了困境”，他说到。
en: I watched my parents cry with joy at being able to vote but now we are stuck," he said.

zhs: 尽管在去年 12 月的地区选举中取得了至关重要的险胜，但是今年加泰罗尼亚支持独立派仍试图保持其势头，其中多位最著名的领袖或自我流放，或因在组织公投以及随后宣布独立期间出头露面而遭拘留候审。
en: Despite managing a vital if narrow victory in regional elections last December, Catalan pro-independence parties have struggled to retain momentum this year with many of their best known leaders either in self imposed exile or in detention awaiting trial for their role in organizing the referendum and subsequent declaration of independence.

zhs: 42 岁的机修工琼普格 (Joan Puig) 用手机记录下了抗议活动，以为警方提供支持，他说，这场冲突是由双方的政客们煽动起来的。
en: Joan Puig, a 42-year-old mechanic recording the protest in support of the police on his phone, said the conflict had been stoked by politicians on both sides.

zhs: “局势越来越紧张”，他表示。
en: "It's getting more and more tense," he said.

zhs: 周六，自去年年末一直关押在预审监狱中的九位加泰罗尼亚领导人之一的奥里奥尔·洪克拉斯 (Oriol Junqueras)，宣布将参加明年的欧洲议会选举。
en: On Saturday, Oriol Junqueras, one of nine Catalan leaders in pre-trial jail since late last year, announced he would run in European Parliament elections next year.

zhs: “作为欧洲议会选举的候选人，公开谴责西班牙政府在民主观念和镇压方面的倒退，这将是最有利的方式”，他说到。
en: "Standing as a candidate for the European elections is the best way to denounce the regression in democratic values and repression we have seen from the Spanish government," he said.

zhs: 伦敦德里郡：三名男子开车撞毁房屋被捕
en: Londonderry: Men arrested after house rammed by car

zhs: 三名作案男子（年龄分别为 33 岁、34 岁、39 岁）驾驶汽车多次撞向伦敦德里郡的一所房屋，事发后，被警方逮捕。
en: Three men, aged 33, 34 and 39, have been arrested after a car was repeatedly rammed into a house in Londonderry.

zhs: 案发时间为周四 19:30 左右，案发地点为 Ballynagard Crescent。
en: The incident unfolded in Ballynagard Crescent on Thursday at about 19:30 BST.

zhs: 高级警官 Bob Blemmings 介绍称，撞击对大门和建筑本身造成了破坏。
en: Det Insp Bob Blemmings said damage was caused to the gates and the building itself.

zhs: 某种情况下，可能已向汽车放弩进行干预。
en: A crossbow may also have been fired at the car at some point.

zhs: 蒙加的进球助力利文斯顿队以 1-0 战胜流浪者队
en: Menga strike gives Livingston 1-0 win over Rangers

zhs: 多利·蒙加 (Dolly Menga) 的首球为利文斯顿球队 (Livingston) 赢得了胜利
en: Dolly Menga's first goal for Livingston secured victory

zhs: 利文斯顿队的晋位震惊了流浪者队，史蒂文·杰拉德 (Steven Gerrard) 在 18 场比赛中,第二次输掉了比赛。
en: Promoted Livingston stunned Rangers to consign Steven Gerrard to just his second defeat in 18 games as manager of the Ibrox club.

zhs: 多利·蒙加 (Dolly Menga) 的进球成了关键决胜之球，加里·霍尔特 (Gary Holt) 的球队在第二节追平了爱尔兰队 (Hibernian)。
en: Dolly Menga's strike proved to be the difference as Gary Holt's side moved level with Hibernian in second.

zhs: 杰拉德的球队本赛季仍然没有客场获胜，他们将在下周日迎战领先其 8 分领跑者红心队。
en: Gerrard's side remain without an away win in the Premiership this season and face leaders Hearts, who they trail by eight points, next Sunday.

zhs: 在此之前，流浪者队 (Rangers) 将于周四在欧洲联赛中 Rapid Vienna 队。在此之前，流浪者队将在周四的欧罗巴联赛中主场迎战维也纳快攻队 (Rapid Vienna)。
en: Before then, Rangers host Rapid Vienna in the Europa League on Thursday.

zhs: 与此同时，利文斯顿球队将继续其在本赛区第六场不败纪录，自从上个月接替肯尼·米勒 (Kenny Miler) 之后，主教练霍尔特未尝到失败的滋味。
en: Livingston, meanwhile, extend their unbeaten run in the division to six games, with head coach Holt still to taste defeat since replacing Kenny Miler last month.

zhs: 利文斯顿队很是怀念与强敌客队对抗的机会
en: Livingston miss chances against blunt visitors

zhs: 霍尔特的球队在得分之前就已经有了领先的迹象，他们的进攻给流浪者带来了各种各样的问题。
en: Holt's team should have been ahead long before they scored, with their directness causing Rangers all manner of problems.

zhs: 斯科特·罗宾逊 (Scott Robinson) 虽然突破了防守，却将球踢到了球门的另一边，阿兰·利思戈 (Alan Lithgow) 在接到克雷格·哈尔科特 (Craig Halkett) 的头球后，被拖到了边路。
en: Scott Robinson broke through but dragged his effort across the face of goal, then Alan Lithgow could only direct his effort wide after sliding in to meet Craig Halkett's header across goal.

zhs: 东道主非常愿意与流浪者队比赛，因为他们知道可以在定位球时，给客队制造麻烦。
en: The hosts were content to let Rangers play in front of them, knowing they could trouble the visitors at set pieces.

zhs: 关键性的射门就是这样产生的。
en: And that was the manner in which the crucial goal came.

zhs: 游骑兵队丢了一个任意球，利文斯顿队开了一个空位，德克兰加拉格尔和罗宾逊一起组建了蒙加，后者从禁区中心接过一记得分。流浪者队丢了一个任意球，利文斯顿队破门，德克兰·加拉格尔 (Declan Gallagher) 和罗宾逊联手围堵蒙加。蒙加在禁区中央触球得分。
en: Rangers conceded a free-kick and Livingston worked an opening, Declan Gallagher and Robinson combining to set up Menga, who took a touch and scored from the centre of the box.

zhs: 这时，流浪者队虽然掌握了控球权，却发现主队防守难以突破，守门员利亚姆凯利 (Liam Kelly) 基本上没什么可担忧的，
en: By that stage, Rangers had dominated possession but had found the home defence impenetrable and goalkeeper Liam Kelly was largely untroubled,

zhs: 这种模式一直持续到下半场，尽管阿尔弗雷多·莫雷洛斯 (Alfredo Morelos) 从凯利脚下抢到了一球。
en: That pattern continued into the second half, though Alfredo Morelos did force a save from Kelly.

zhs: 斯科特·皮特曼 (Scott Pittman) 被流浪者队门将阿兰·麦格雷戈 (Allan McGregor) 一脚挡出，利思戈将利文斯顿队的另一个定位球踢偏。
en: Scott Pittman was denied by the feet of Rangers goalkeeper Allan McGregor and Lithgow flicked wide from another Livingston set play.

zhs: Crosses 不断进入利文斯顿队的禁区，并不断地被解围，而两个点球——在哈尔科特提出要让替补格伦·米德尔顿 (Glenn Middleton) 上场和一个手球之后——被踢了回去。
en: Crosses continually came into the Livingston box and were continually cleared, while two penalty claims - after Halkett's challenge on substitute Glenn Middleton, and one for handball - were waved away.

zhs: 利文斯顿队“超凡表现”分析
en: 'Phenomenal' from Livingston - analysis

zhs: BBC 苏格兰记者阿拉斯代尔·拉蒙特 (Alasdair Lamont) 在Tony Macaroni Arena 报道
en: BBC Scotland's Alasdair Lamont at the Tony Macaroni Arena

zhs: 利文斯顿队表现超凡，成绩惊人。
en: A phenomenal performance and result for Livingston.

zhs: 全体球员的表现都十分优秀，再一次超越了人们的期望。
en: To a man, they were excellent, continuing to exceed expectations on this upward trajectory.

zhs: 自从霍尔特重返顶级联赛以来，这支球队的比赛风格和人员配置几乎没有什么变化，但霍尔特给球队带来的荣誉确实值得称道。
en: Their style of play and personnel has scarcely changed since their return to the top flight, but great credit has to go to Holt for the way he has galvanised the team since his arrival.

zhs: 他带出了很多英雄般的球员。
en: He had so many heroes.

zhs: 队长哈尔科特功不可没，他部署了组织性超强的防守阵容，而蒙加在整个过程中，让康纳·戈德森 (Connor Goldson) 和乔·沃拉尔 (Joe Worrall) 未曾放下过提防。
en: Captain Halkett was immense, marshalling a superbly-organised defence, while Menga kept Connor Goldson and Joe Worrall on their toes throughout.

zhs: 不过，流浪者队的士气不够足。
en: Rangers were short of inspiration, though.

zhs: 他们在杰拉德的带领下，偶尔表现尚佳，但远没有达到标准。
en: As good as they have been at times under Gerrard, they fell well short of those standards.

zhs: 他们的最后一球没有踢进——他们只切入了主队一次——这对处于中游的流浪者队来说，可谓一个警钟。
en: Their final ball was lacking - only once did they cut the home side open - and it is something of a wake-up call for Rangers, who find themselves in mid-table.

zhs: 埃尔多安在科隆喜忧参半
en: Erdogan get mixed reception in Cologne

zhs: 周六（9 月 29 日），也就是土耳其总统来德国进行国事访问的最后一天，一片万里晴空，两国领导人在柏林举行了一场友好的早餐会。
en: There were smiles and blue skies on Saturday (September 29) as the leaders of Turkey and Germany met for breakast in Berlin.

zhs: 埃尔多安总统的此次德国之行颇受争议，这次访问旨在修复这两个北约盟国之间的关系。
en: It's the last day of President Erdogan's controversial visit to Germany - which is aimed at repairing relations beteen the NATO allies.

zhs: 他们在人权、新闻自由和土耳其加入欧盟等问题上而陷入僵持。
en: They've fallen out over issues including human rights, press freedom and Turkey's accession to the EU.

zhs: 随后，埃尔多安前往在科隆新落成的一座巨大的清真寺。
en: Erdogan then headed for Cologne to open a giant new mosque.

zhs: 科隆这个城市的土耳其人口众多，是土耳其国家以外，土耳其人口最多的城市。
en: The city is home to the largest Turkish population outside Turkey.

zhs: 警方以安全为由，阻止了 25,000 名观众前往该清真寺参加集会，但附近还是出现了很多支持者，欢迎总统的到来。
en: Police cited security reasons to block a 25,000-strong crowd from gathering in front of the mosque, but plenty of supporters turned out nearby to see their president.

zhs: 数百名反对埃尔多安的抗议者（其中很多人都属于库尔德人）也发出了发对的声音，谴责埃尔多安的政策，谴责德国政府不该欢迎埃尔多安来德国访问。
en: Hundreds of anti-Erdogan protesters - many of them Kurdish - also made their voices heard, condemning both Erdogan's policies and the German government's decision to welcome him to the country.

zhs: 两方抗议活动反映出的是对埃尔多安来访问题上产生的分歧：一部分德国土耳其人称其为英雄，另一部分人则谴责其为独裁者。
en: The dueling protests reflect the divisiveness of a visitor hailed as a hero by some German Turks and reviled as an autocrat by others.

zhs: 德特福德道路交通事故：单车车主与汽车相撞后死亡
en: Deptford road crash: Cyclist dies in collision with car

zhs: 一名单车车主在伦敦的一起撞车事故中死亡。
en: A cyclist has died in a collision involving a car in London.

zhs: 事故发生的时间大约为英国夏令时上午 10:15，事故地点为 Bestwood Street 和 Evelyn Street 的交界处附近，这里是该市东南部的德特福德 (Deptford) 的一条繁忙的路段。
en: The crash happened near the junction of Bestwood Street and Evelyn Street, a busy road in Deptford, in the south-east of the city, at about 10:15 BST.

zhs: 汽车司机停车查看，医护人员实施了救援，但单车车主已当场死亡。
en: The driver of the car stopped and paramedics attended, but the man died at the scene.

zhs: 就在这场事故发生的几个月之前，距离周六这起撞车事件大约一英里左右的奇尔德斯街 (Childers Street) 上，另一名单车车主在一起肇事逃逸撞车事件中不幸身亡。
en: The crash comes months after another cyclist died in a hit-and-run on Childers Street, about a mile away from Saturday's crash.

zhs: 伦敦大都会区警局 (Metropolitan Police) 称，警方正在确定该男子的身份，然后会向其直系亲属通知此事。
en: The Metropolitan Police said officers were working to identify the man and inform his next-of-kin.

zhs: 目前已封闭道路，做好了公共汽车改道工作，建议驾驶者绕开这一地区而行。
en: Road closures and bus diversions are in place and motorists have been advised to avoid the area.

zhs: Long Lartin 监狱：骚乱致六名狱警受伤
en: Long Lartin prison: Six officers hurt in disorder

zhs: 监狱办公室表示，一座高设防的男子监狱发生暴乱，六名狱警在骚乱中受伤。
en: Six prison officers have been injured in a disturbance at a high security men's jail, the Prison Office has said.

zhs: 英国夏令时周日早上 9 点 30 分，伍斯特郡的 HMP Long Lartin 监狱爆发骚乱，并且骚乱仍在进行中。
en: Disorder broke out at HMP Long Lartin in Worcestershire at about 09:30 BST on Sunday and is ongoing.

zhs: 相关部门派出专门的旋风突击队到场处理，暴乱涉及八名囚犯，目前已将所有牵涉人员控制于一座楼房。
en: Specialist "Tornado" officers have been brought in to deal with the disturbance, which involves eight inmates and is contained to one wing.

zhs: 狱警面部受到轻伤，接受现场治疗。
en: The officers were treated for minor facial injuries at the scene.

zhs: 监狱管理局发言人介绍道：“已经部署了专门应付监狱暴乱的工作人员去处理 HMP Long Lartin 正在继续的暴乱。
en: A Prison Service spokesperson said: "Specially trained prison staff have been deployed to deal with an ongoing incident at HMP Long Lartin.

zhs: 六名受伤狱警已接受了治疗。
en: Six members of staff have been treated for injuries.

zhs: 我们绝不容忍监狱中有任何暴力行为，并且，我们会将始作俑者移交给给警方，这些作乱人员可能面临更长的监禁。”
en: We do not tolerate violence in our prisons, and are clear that those responsible will be referred to the police and could spend longer behind bars."

zhs: HMP Long Lartin 监狱有 500 多名囚犯，其中包括英国一些最危险的罪犯。
en: HMP Long Lartin holds more than 500 prisoners, including some of the country's most dangerous offenders.

zhs: 据报道，6 月份，这所监狱的监狱长遭到囚犯袭击，后送往医院治疗。
en: In June it was reported that the prison's governor received hospital treatment after being attacked by a prisoner.

zhs: 去年 10 月，动用了防暴警察，前往这所监狱处理重大骚乱，遭到台球袭击。
en: And in October last year riot officers were called to the prison to deal with a serious disturbance in which staff were attacked with pool balls.

zhs: 飓风罗莎 (Rosa) 对凤凰城、拉斯维加斯、盐湖城造成洪水威胁（干旱地区可能会因此而受益）
en: Hurricane Rosa Threatening Phoenix, Las Vegas, Salt Lake City With Flash Flooding (Drought Areas May Benefit)

zhs: 热带低气压袭击亚利桑那州的事件十分罕见，但这一情况很可能在下周早些时候发生，因为飓风罗莎 (Rosa) 的残余力量将袭击西南部沙漠地区，从而引发洪水危险。
en: It's rare for a tropical depression to hit Arizona, but that's exactly what's likely to happen early happen early next week as Hurricane Rosa's remaining energy tracks across the Desert Southwest, delivering flash flooding risks.

zhs: 国家气象局已经针对周一和周二，向亚利桑那州西部至内华达州南部和东部、加利福尼亚州东南部和犹他州（包括凤凰城、弗拉格斯塔夫、拉斯维加斯和盐湖城）等地区发布了洪水预警。
en: The National Weather Service has already issued flash flood watches for Monday and Tuesday for western Arizona into southern and eastern Nevada, southeastern California and Utah, including the cities of Phoenix, Flagstaff, Las Vegas, and Salt Lake City.

zhs: 罗莎预计于周一晚些时候携降雨到达，于周二在凤凰城上方过境。
en: Rosa is expected to take a direct path over Phoenix on Tuesday, approaching late Monday with rain.

zhs: 驻凤凰城国家气象局在推特上写道，“自 1950 年以来，只有十个热带气旋在距离凤凰城 200 英里以内，仍保持着热带风暴或低气压状态！
en: The National Weather Service in Phoenix noted in a tweet that only "ten tropical cyclones have maintained tropical storm or depression status within 200 miles of Phoenix since 1950!

zhs: 卡特里娜 (Katrina) (1967) 是一场从亚利桑那州边境 40 英里以内登陆的飓风”。
en: Katrina (1967) was a hurricane within 40 miles of the AZ border."

zhs: 根据最新的国家飓风中心 (National Hurricane Cente) 模型预测，降雨量将达到 2 到 4 英寸，亚利桑那州莫戈隆边缘的局部降雨量将达到 6 英寸。
en: The latest National Hurricane Center models predict 2 to 4 inches of rainfall, with isolated amounts up to 6 inches in the Mogollon Rim of Arizona.

zhs: 包括落基山脉中部和大盆地在内的其他西南部沙漠地区降雨量很可能达到 1 到 2 英寸，局部总降雨量有可能达到 4 英寸。
en: Other areas of the Desert Southwest including the central Rockies and the Great Basin are likely to get 1 to 2 inches, with isolated totals up to 4 inches possible.

zhs: 对于不会引发洪水危险的地区，由于这些地区旱情严重，因此罗莎带来的降水可能是一件幸事。
en: For those out of flash flood risk, Rosa's rain may be a blessing since the region is drought-stricken.

zhs: 虽然洪水引发高度重视，但适量降雨也可能是有益的，因为西南部地区目前正经历着干旱。
en: Although flooding is a very serious concern, some of this rainfall will likely be beneficial since the Southwest is currently experiencing drought conditions.

zhs: 据 weather.com 报道，美国干旱监测周报 (U.S. Drought Monitor) 显示，亚利桑那州 40% 以上的地区正经历着至少极端干旱条件（第二严重的类别）。
en: According to the U.S. Drought Monitor, just over 40 percent of Arizona is experiencing at least extreme drought, the second highest category," weather.com reported.

zhs: 首先，飓风罗莎的路径将致使其登陆墨西哥的下加利福尼亚半岛。
en: First, Hurricane Rosa's path leads to landfall across the Baja California peninsula of Mexico.

zhs: 周日早上，罗莎仍处于飓风强度，最大风力为每小时 85 英里，位于墨西哥尤金尼亚角以南 385 英里处，正以每小时 12 英里的速度向北移动。
en: Rosa, still at hurricane strength Sunday morning with maximum winds of 85 miles per hour, is 385 miles south of Punta Eugenia, Mexico and moving north at 12 miles per hour.

zhs: 飓风接触了太平上凉爽的海水，因而风力减弱。
en: The storm is encountering cooler waters in the Pacific and therefore powering down.

zhs: 因此，预计将于周一下午或晚上以热带风暴的强度从墨西哥登陆。
en: Thus, it's expected to make landfall in Mexico at tropical storm strength in the afternoon or evening on Monday.

zhs: 墨西哥部分地区的降雨量可能会很大，存在引发洪水的危险。
en: Rainfall across portions of Mexico could be heavy, posing a significant flooding risk.

zhs: 据 weather.com 报道，“预计从下加利福尼亚半岛至索诺拉州西北部的总降雨量将达到 3 到 6 英寸，甚至可能达到 10 英寸”。
en: "Rainfall totals of 3 to 6 inches are expected from Baja California into northwestern Sonora, with up to 10 inches possible," weather.com reported.

zhs: 随后，罗莎将以热带风暴的形式向北穿越墨西哥，于周二凌晨以热带低气压的形式抵达亚利桑那州边境，并于周二深夜穿过整个亚利桑那州，进入犹他州南部。
en: Rosa will then track north across Mexico as a tropical storm before reaching the Arizona border in the early morning hours Tuesday as a tropical depression, which will then track up through Arizona and into southern Utah by late Tuesday night.

zhs: 国家飓风中心表示“预计罗莎或其残余力量的主要危害将是，为下加利福尼亚半岛、索诺拉州西北部和美国西南部沙漠地区带来强降雨”。
en: "The main hazard expected from Rosa or its remnants is very heavy rainfall in Baja California, northwestern Sonora, and the U.S. Desert Southwest," the National Hurricane Center said.

zhs: 预计此番降雨将在沙漠地区引发危及生命的洪水和泥石流，并在山区地带引发山体滑坡。
en: These rains are expected to produce life-threatening flash flooding and debris flows in the deserts, and landslides in mountainous terrain.

zhs: Midsomer Norton 袭击事件：四名蓄意谋杀嫌疑犯获捕
en: Midsomer Norton attack: Four attempted murder arrests

zhs: 一名 16 岁的男孩在萨默塞特身上，发现多处刺伤，随后，犯罪嫌疑人涉嫌蓄意谋杀被捕。犯罪嫌疑人系为三名十几岁的男孩，和一名二十岁的男子。
en: Three teenage boys and a 20-year-old man have been arrested on suspicion of attempted murder after a 16-year-old was found with stab wounds in Somerset.

zhs: 被害的十几岁男孩于星期六凌晨 4 点左右，在诺顿 (Midsomer Norton) 的 Excelsior Terrace 地区被发现受伤，
en: The teenage boy was found injured in the Excelsior Terrace area of Midsomer Norton, at about 04:00 BST on Saturday.

zhs: 随后被送往医院，目前伤势“稳定”。
en: He was taken to hospital where he remains in a "stable" condition.

zhs: 埃文萨默塞特警局 (Avon and Somerset Police) 称，已于拉德斯托克 (Radstock) 地区将犯罪嫌疑人（其中，有 17 岁男子一名、18 岁男子两名，20 岁男子一名）连夜抓捕归案。
en: A 17-year-old, two 18-year-olds and a 20-year-old man were arrested overnight in the Radstock area, Avon and Somerset Police said.

zhs: 警方呼吁用手机抓拍到现场视频的目击者踊跃提供线索。
en: Officers have appealed for anyone who may have any mobile phone footage of what happened to come forward.

zhs: 特朗普称卡瓦诺是民主党“卑鄙愤怒的承受者"
en: Trump says Kavanaugh 'suffered, the meanness, the anger' of the Democratic Party

zhs: 特朗普在西弗吉尼亚州惠灵的一次集会上称：“投卡瓦诺法官一票，就是对民主党无情和无耻战术所投的反对票。”
en: "A vote for Judge Kavanaugh is a vote to reject the ruthless and outrageous tactics of the Democratic Party," Trump said at a rally in Wheeling, West Virginia.

zhs: 特朗普称，卡瓦诺在整个提名过程中“遭受了民主党的卑鄙和愤怒”。
en: Trump said that Kavanaugh has "suffered the meanness, the anger" of the Democratic Party throughout his nomination process.

zhs: 卡瓦诺周四在接受国会审问时，情绪激动地强烈否认克里斯汀·布莱西·福特 (Christine Blasey Ford) 对其提出的指控，称几十年前，年少的他未曾性侵过福特。
en: Kavanaugh testified before Congress on Thursday, forcefully and emotionally denying an allegation from Christine Blasey Ford that he sexually assaulted her decades ago when they were teenagers.

zhs: 福特也就其指控出席听证会。
en: Ford also testified at the hearing about her allegation.

zhs: 总统周六表示，那天“美国人民看到了卡瓦诺的过人正气和勇气”。
en: The President said on Saturday that the "American people saw the brilliant and quality and courage" of Kavanaugh that day.

zhs: 总统对西弗吉尼亚州的支持者说道，“投票支持卡瓦诺法官，就是投票认可我们这个时代最有成就的法律智者，一名公共服务有口皆碑的法学家”。
en: "A vote to confirm Judge Kavanaugh is a vote to confirm one of the most accomplished legal minds of our time, a jurist with a sterling record of public service," he told the crowd of West Virginia supporters.

zhs: 总统在谈到共和党选情在中期选举中的重要性时，间接影射了卡瓦诺的提名。
en: The President obliquely referred to Kavanaugh's nomination while talking about the importance of Republican turnout in the midterm elections.

zhs: ”距离我们一生中最重要的一次选举，还有五周的时间。
en: "Five weeks away from one of the most important elections in our lifetimes.

zhs: “我不是在竞选，我这样四处奔波，
en: I'm not running, but I'm really running," he said.

zhs: 就是为了能让你们选出优秀的候选人”，他说道。
en: "That's why I'm all over the place fighting for great candidates."

zhs: 特朗普称，民主党肩负的使命就是“抵抗和阻挠”。
en: Trump argued that Democrats are on a mission to "resist and obstruct."

zhs: 一名共和党高级领导助理向美国有线电视新闻网 (CNN) 介绍称，预计，最晚将于周五在参议院举行对卡瓦诺提名的第一次关键程序性投票。
en: The first key procedural vote on the Senate floor on Kavanaugh's nomination is expected to take place no later than Friday, a senior GOP leadership aide has told CNN.

zhs: 印尼地震和海啸造成数百人死亡，目前死亡人数仍在上升
en: Hundreds killed by Indonesian quake, tsunami, with toll seen rising

zhs: 印尼当局于周六表示，一场大地震和海啸袭击了印尼苏拉威西岛，造成至少 384 人死亡，多人在巨浪冲上海滩时被卷走。
en: At least 384 people were killed, many swept away as giant waves crashed onto beaches, when a major earthquake and tsunami hit the Indonesian island of Sulawesi, authorities said on Saturday.

zhs: 周五傍晚，数百人正聚集在巴鲁市的海滩上参加派对，这时高达 6 米（18 英尺）的海浪冲上海岸，造成多人死亡，海啸所到之处全部面目全非。
en: Hundreds of people had gathered for a festival on the beach in the city of Palu on Friday when waves as high as six meters (18 feet) smashed onshore at dusk, sweeping many to their deaths and destroying anything in their path.

zhs: 这场海啸由 7.5 级的地震引发。
en: The tsunami followed a 7.5 magnitude earthquake.

zhs: 印尼减灾机构 BNPB 发言人苏托波·普沃·努格罗霍 (Sutopo Purwo Nugroho) 在雅加达的情况通报会上说道：“昨天海啸发生时，人们正在海滩上活动，没能及时逃离，因而不幸遇难”。
en: "When the tsunami threat arose yesterday, people were still doing their activities on the beach and did not immediately run and they became victims," Sutopo Purwo Nugroho, the spokesman for Indonesia's disaster mitigation agency BNPB said in a briefing in Jakarta.

zhs: “海啸夹杂着汽车、木柴、房屋而来，席卷了陆地上的一切”，努格罗霍说到，又补充到，海啸以每小时 800 公里（每小时 497 英里）的速度穿过公海，然后才袭击了海岸线。
en: "The tsunami didn't come by itself, it dragged cars, logs, houses, it hit everything on land," Nugroho said, adding that the tsunami had traveled across the open sea at speeds of 800 kph (497 mph) before striking the shoreline.

zhs: 有的人爬到树上躲避海啸得以幸存，他说。
en: Some people climbed trees to escape the tsunami and survived, he said.

zhs: 大约 16,700 人被疏散至巴鲁的 24 个疏散中心。
en: Around 16,700 people were evacuated to 24 centers in Palu.

zhs: 救灾机构发布的航拍照片显示，许多建筑和店铺被毁，桥梁扭曲、坍塌，一座清真寺被海水包围。
en: Aerial photographs released by the disaster agency showed many buildings and shops destroyed, bridges twisted and collapsed and a mosque surrounded by water.

zhs: 周六，余震持续侵扰着这座沿海城市。
en: Aftershocks continued to rock the coastal city on Saturday.

zhs: 这片拥有 240 万人口的区域都感受到了强烈的震感。
en: The series of earthquakes were felt in an area with 2.4 million people.

zhs: 印尼技术评估与应用机构 (BPPT) 在一份声明中指出，周五的大地震所释放的威力大约是二战期间投放在广岛的原子弹的 200 倍。
en: Indonesia's Agency for the Assessment and Application of Technology (BPPT) said in statement the energy released by Friday's massive quake was around 200 times the power of the atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima in World War Two.

zhs: 声明还指出，这座城市位于一座狭长海湾的尽头，因此地理位置有可能放大了海啸的威力。
en: The geography of the city, which sits at the end of a long, narrow bay, could have magnified the size of the tsunami, it said.

zhs: 努格罗霍将损毁描述为“大规模”，并表示成千上万的房屋、医院、购物中心和酒店被摧毁。
en: Nugroho described the damage as "extensive" and said thousands of houses, hospitals, shopping malls and hotels had collapsed.

zhs: 一些遇难者的尸体被压在坍塌建筑的废墟下，他说到，并补充到有 540 人受伤，29 人失踪。
en: Bodies of some victims were found trapped under the rubble of collapsed buildings, he said, adding 540 people were injured and 29 were missing.

zhs: 努格罗霍表示巴鲁北部 300 公里（190 英里）海岸线沿途的伤亡和毁坏情况可能更加严重，那片区域是栋加拉，距离震中更近。
en: Nugroho said the casualties and the damage could be greater along the coastline 300 km (190 miles) north of Palu, an area called Donggala, which is closer to the epicenter of the quake.

zhs: 栋加拉的通讯“完全瘫痪，没有任何消息”，努格罗霍说到。
en: Communications "were totally crippled with no information" from Donggala, Nugroho said.

zhs: 红十字会声明称，那片区域有 300,000 以上的人口居住，并补充到，红十字会的工作人员和志愿者正在前往受灾区域。
en: There are more than 300,000 people living there," the Red Cross said in a statement, adding that its staff and volunteers were heading to the affected areas.

zhs: “虽然这已经是一场悲剧，但情况有可能会更糟糕”，红十字会表示。
en: "This is already a tragedy, but it could get much worse," it said.

zhs: 由于没有告知广大民众海啸袭击了巴鲁，该机构于周六受到了广泛的批评，尽管官员们称，海啸发生在警报发布之后。
en: The agency on Saturday was widely criticized for not informing that a tsunami had hit Palu, though officials said waves had come within the time the warning was issued.

zhs: 在社交媒体上分享的一段业余爱好者拍摄的视频中，可以听到一名身处建筑上层的男子对下面街道上的人群疯狂呼喊，警告他们海啸即将来临。
en: In amateur footage shared on social media a man on the upper floor of a building can be heard shouting frantic warnings of the approaching tsunami to people on the street below.

zhs: 几分钟后，水墙冲上海岸，卷走了建筑和车辆。
en: Within minutes a wall of water crashes onto the shore, carrying away buildings and cars.

zhs: 路透社无法立即鉴定视频的真实性。
en: Reuters was not able to immediately authenticate the footage.

zhs: 地震和海啸造成大规模停电，切断了巴鲁周围的通讯，致使政府当局无法协调救援工作。
en: The quake and tsunami caused a major power outage that cut communications around Palu making it difficult for authorities to coordinate rescue efforts.

zhs: 印尼当局称，军方已经开始从雅加达和其他城市派出救援运输飞机，但是疏散人员仍然急需食物和其他基本必需品。
en: The military has started sending in cargo planes with aid from Jakarta and other cities, authorities said, but evacuees still badly need food and other basic necessities.

zhs: 巴鲁市的机场目前只针对救援工作重新开放，并将在 10 月份之前处于关闭状态。
en: The city's airport has been reopened only for relief efforts and will remain closed until Oct.

zhs: 总统佐科·维多多 (Joko Widodo ) 计划于周日访问巴鲁的疏散中心。
en: President Joko Widodo was scheduled to visit evacuation centers in Palu on Sunday.

zhs: 印尼海啸死亡人数升至 800 人以上。
en: Indonesia Tsunami Toll Soars Above 800.

zhs: 这真的非常糟糕。
en: It Is Very Bad.

zhs: 虽然栋加拉世界宣明会的工作人员已经安全抵达巴鲁市，而巴鲁市的员工也暂时安置在公司院子里临时搭建的油布避难所内，但他们在途中看到的景象却惨不忍睹，Doseba 说到。
en: While World Vision's staff from Donggala have made it safely to Palu city, where employees are sheltering in tarpaulin shelters set up in the courtyard of their office, they passed scenes of devastation on the way, Mr. Doseba said.

zhs: “他们说看到多处房屋被损毁”，他说。
en: "They told me they saw lots of houses that were destroyed," he said.

zhs: 这真的非常糟糕。
en: It is very bad.

zhs: 就在救援组织开始这场残酷的战役，启动赈灾设备的同时，一些人抱怨称，具有深厚专业知识的外籍救援人员被禁止前往巴鲁。
en: Even as aid groups began the grim motions of starting the gears of disaster relief, some complained that foreign aid workers with deep expertise were being prevented from traveling to Palu.

zhs: 根据印尼法律规定，只有宣布灾难现场为国家灾难区时，才会允许海外资金、物资和工作人员的流动。
en: According to Indonesian regulations, funding, supplies and staffing from overseas can only start flowing if the site of a calamity is declared a national disaster zone.

zhs: 但是尚未宣布。
en: That has not happened yet.

zhs: “这仍是一场省级灾难”，印尼红十字会发言人 Aulia Arriani 说到。
en: "It's still a province level disaster," said Aulia Arriani, a spokesperson for the Indonesian Red Cross.

zhs: “一旦政府表示，‘这是一场国家灾难’，我们便可以为国际救援放行，但是目前的情况尚不允许。”
en: "Once the government says, "O.K., this is a national disaster," we can open for international assistance but there's no status yet."

zhs: 周五发生地震和海啸后的第二天晚上，在巴鲁，失踪人员的亲友们仍抱着一线希望，希望他们的亲人能够创造奇迹，为这场悲惨的自然灾害增添一抹色彩。
en: As the second night fell on Palu after Friday's earthquake and tsunami, friends and family of those still missing were holding out hope that their loved ones would be the miracles that leaven the bleak story lines of natural disasters.

zhs: 周六，救援人员从下水道里打捞上来一名小男孩。
en: On Saturday, a little boy was plucked from a sewer.

zhs: 周日，救援人员救出了一位在瓦砾下被压了两天的妇女，而她母亲的尸体就在她身旁。
en: On Sunday, rescuers freed a woman who had been pinned under rubble for two days with the body of her mother next to her.

zhs: 印尼国家滑翔伞队教练 Gendon Subandono 曾对两名失踪的滑翔伞运动员进行训练，以备战本月初于印尼举行的亚运会。
en: Gendon Subandono, the coach of the Indonesian national paragliding team, had trained two of the missing paragliders for the Asian Games, which wrapped up earlier this month in Indonesia.

zhs: 包括 Mandagi 在内的其他被困在 Roa Roa 酒店的人都是他的学生。
en: Others of those trapped at the Roa Roa Hotel, Mr. Mandagi included, were his students.

zhs: “作为滑翔伞领域的资深运动员，我承受着个人的情感负担”，他说。
en: "As a senior in the paragliding field, I have my own emotional burden," he said.

zhs: Gendon 称，在 Roa Roa 酒店倒塌的消息在滑翔伞社区中传开之后的几个小时里，他拼命给参加沙滩派对的巴鲁竞争对手发 WhatsApp 消息。
en: Mr. Gendon recounted how, in the hours after the news of the Roa Roa Hotel collapse circulated among the paragliding community, he had desperately sent WhatsApp messages to the Palu competitors, who were taking part in the beach festival.

zhs: 然而，他的消息始终只显示一个灰色的对号，而不是一对蓝色的对号。
en: His messages, though, only resulted in one gray check mark, rather than a pair of blue checks.

zhs: “我想这意味着消息没有发送成功”，他说。
en: "I think that means the messages were not delivered," he said.

zhs: 盗贼在 Newport on the Levee 的 ATM 加钞时盗走 26,750 美元
en: Thieves take $26,750 during ATM refill at Newport on the Levee

zhs: 纽波特警察局 (Newport Police Department) 发布的新闻报道介绍称，周五上午，一名 Brink 的工作人员在向 Newport on the Levee 的 ATM 里放钞票时，被盗贼偷走了 26,750 美元。
en: Thieves on Friday morning stole $26,750 from a Brink's worker refilling an ATM at Newport on the Levee, according to a news release from the Newport Police Department.

zhs: 警察局的 Dennis McCarthy 在报道中介绍称，当时，这辆汽车司机清空好了这家娱乐餐厅的 ATM，正准备往里面加钞。
en: The car's driver had been emptying an ATM in the entertainment complex and preparing to deliver more money, Det. Dennis McCarthy wrote in the release.

zhs: 就在他忙着的时候，一名男子“从这位 Brink 员工身后跑了出来”，偷走一袋本应加到 ATM 里的钞票。
en: While he was occupied, another man "ran up from behind the Brink's employee" and stole a bag of money meant for delivery.

zhs: 据报道，目击者发现有多名嫌疑人逃离现场，但警方并未具体说明案件所涉及的人数。
en: Witnesses spotted multiple suspects fleeing the scene, according to the release, but police did not specify the number involved in the incident.

zhs: 任何能够提供有关盗贼身份信息者，应致电 859-292-3680 联系纽波特警方。
en: Anyone with information about their identities should contact Newport police at 859-292-3680.

zhs: 坎耶·维斯特：说唱歌手将他的名字改为 "Ye"
en: Kanye West: Rapper changes his name to Ye

zhs: 说唱歌手坎耶·维斯特 (Kanye West) 改名为 "Ye"。
en: Rapper Kanye West is changing his name - to Ye.

zhs: 他周六在 Twitter 上宣布更名。具体内容为："之前大家所熟知的坎耶·维斯特"。
en: Announcing the change on Twitter on Saturday, he wrote: "The being formally known as Kanye West."

zhs: 现年 41 岁的维斯特被叫做 "Ye" 这个名字已经有一段时间了，他还将这个名字用作了 2018 年 6 月发布的第八张专辑的标题。
en: West, 41, has been nicknamed Ye for some time and used the moniker as the title for his eighth album, which was released in June.

zhs: 这一更名宣布于他参加《周六夜现场》节目之前，预计他将在节目中推出他的新专辑《Yandhi》。
en: The change comes ahead of his appearance on Saturday Night Live, where he is expected to launch his new album Yandhi.

zhs: 节目制作人说，他接替了因“感情原因”取消上节目安排的歌手阿里安娜·格兰德 (Ariana Grande)。
en: He replaces singer Ariana Grande on the show who cancelled for "emotional reasons," the show's creator said.

zhs: 除了作为维斯特现在的专业名称的缩写之外，他之前曾说过，这个词对他来说具有宗教意义。
en: As well as being an abbreviation of his current professional name, West has previously said the word has religious significance for him.

zhs: 维斯特今年年初与电台主播“大男孩” (Big Boy) 讨论他的专辑标题时曾说过：“我相信 ‘Ye’ 是《圣经》中最常用的单词，在《圣经》中是‘你’的意思。
en: "I believe 'ye' is the most commonly used word in the Bible, and in the Bible it means 'you,'" West said earlier this year, discussing his album title with radio host Big Boy.

zhs: “这样，我就是你，就是我们。
en: "So I'm you, I'm us, it's us.

zhs: 之前我用的名字是 "Kanye"，意思是“唯一”，现在改名为 "Ye"，这反映出了我们的善、恶、迷茫、一切。
en: It went from Kanye, which means the only one, to just Ye - just being a reflection of our good, our bad, our confused, everything.

zhs: 这张专辑更多反映了我们是谁。”
en: The album is more of a reflection of who we are."

zhs: 很多著名说唱歌手都改过名字。
en: He is one of a number of famous rappers to change their name.

zhs: 肖恩·库姆斯 (Sean Combs) 用过很多个名字，最常用的是“Puff Daddy” (P. Diddy)（吹牛老爹）以及 Diddy（老爹），但今年他宣布自己更喜欢“Love（爱）”和“Brother Love（兄弟之情）”这两个名字。
en: Sean Combs has been variously known as Puff Daddy, P. Diddy or Diddy, but this year announced his preference for the names Love and Brother Love.

zhs: 以前曾经与维斯特合作过的 JAY-Z 也曾经改过名字，改名的方式是用连字符或者不用连字符以及大写字母。
en: A former West collaborator, JAY-Z, has also made do with or without a hyphen and capitals.

zhs: 墨西哥 AMLO 郑重宣告不会对平民使用武力
en: Mexico's AMLO vows not to use military against civilians

zhs: 墨西哥当选总统安德烈斯·曼努埃尔·洛佩斯·奥夫拉多尔郑重宣告，在该国即将迎来的学生迫害事件 50 周年之际，绝不会对平民使用武力。
en: Mexican President-elect Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador has vowed to never use military force against civilians as the country approaches the 50th anniversary of a bloody reprisal against students.

zhs: 周六，洛佩斯·奥夫拉多尔在特拉特洛尔科广场 (Tlatelolco Plaza) 许下承诺，“绝不会使用武力，压制墨西哥人民”。
en: Lopez Obrador promised Saturday at Tlatelolco Plaza to "never ever use the military to repress the Mexican people."

zhs: 1968 年 10 月 2 日，左派学生运动在整个拉丁美洲扎根之际，墨西哥部队在广场和平示威期间开枪射击，造成多达 300 人死亡。
en: Troops fired on a peaceful demonstration at the plaza on Oct. 2, 1968, killing as many as 300 people at a time when leftist student movements were taking root throughout Latin America.

zhs: 洛佩斯·奥夫拉多尔承诺，将为学习人员提供补贴，并开设更多免费公立大学，以此支持墨西哥年轻一代的发展。
en: Lopez Obrador has pledged to support young Mexicans by giving monthly subsidies to those who study and opening more free public universities.

zhs: 他表示，失业和缺乏教育机会会导致青少年走向犯罪道路。
en: He has said that unemployment and a lack of educational opportunities draws youth to criminal gangs.

zhs: 美国应加倍 A.I. 资金
en: U.S. should double A.I. funding

zhs: 随着中国在人工智能领域研究更加活跃，美国应将其在该领域的研究支出，增加一倍，投资者兼 AI 从业者 Kai-Fu Lee 介绍称。Lee 曾供职于谷歌、微软和苹果公司。
en: As China becomes more active in artificial intelligence, the U.S. should double the amount it spends on research in the field, says investor and AI practitioner Kai-Fu Lee, who has worked for Google, Microsoft and Apple.

zhs: 此番言论针对的是美国政府各部门作出的 AI 公告，美国总体上，缺少正式的人工智能战略。
en: The comments come after various parts of the U.S. government have made AI announcements, even as the U.S. overall lacks a formal AI strategy.

zhs: 而中国去年却推出了一项计划：力争在 2030 年，成为人工智能创新的老大。
en: Meanwhile, China introduced its plan last year: it's aiming to be No.1 in AI innovation by 2030.

zhs: “在这一领域，所有其他国家都远远落后于美国，而我们正在寻找人工智能的新突破，所以，人工智能研究预算加倍将是一个良好的开端”，Lee 介绍道。
en: "Double the AI research budget would be a good start, given that all other countries are so much farther behind U.S., and we're looking for the next breakthrough in AI," said Lee.

zhs: Lee 在本周接受 CNBC 采访时介绍称，资金加倍可能会使美国再次成为人工智能突破者的几率加倍。
en: Doubling funding could double the chances that the next big AI achievement will be made in the U.S., Lee told CNBC in an interview this week.

zhs: Lee 的著作《人工智能超级大国：中国、硅谷与新世界秩序》于上个月由哈考特出版社出版。Lee 是 Sinovation Ventures 公司的 CEO，他投资了中国最知名的一家 AI 公司 Face++。
en: Lee, whose book "AI Superpowers: China, Silicon Valley and the New World Order" was published this month by Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, is CEO of Sinovation Ventures, which has invested in one of the most prominent AI companies in China, Face++.

zhs: 20 世纪 80年 代，他在卡耐基梅隆大学 (Carnegie Mellon University) 创建了一个人工智能系统，击败了排名最高的美国选手奥赛罗 (Othello)，之后，他又出任可微软研究院的高管和谷歌中国分公司的总裁。
en: In the 1980s at Carnegie Mellon University he worked on an AI system that beat the highest-ranked American Othello player, and later he was an executive at Microsoft Research and president of Google's China branch.

zhs: Lee 对之前的美国政府科技竞赛，如国防部高级研究计划局 (Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency) 的机器人挑战赛 (Robotics Challenge) 做出了认可，随后发问，为了成就下一批梦想家还将推出什么竞赛。
en: Lee acknowledged previous U.S. government technology competitions like the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency's Robotics Challenge and asked when the next one would be, in order to help identify the next visionaries.

zhs: 美国的研究人员为了获得政府补助，经常要大费周章，Lee 说道。
en: Researchers in the U.S. often have to work hard in order to win government grants, Lee said.

zhs: “不是中国在抢我们的学术领导者，而是企业”，Lee 说道。
en: "It's not China that is taking away the academic leaders; it's the corporates," Lee said.

zhs: 近年来，Facebook、谷歌和其他科技公司聘请了大学的杰出人士从事 AI 工作。
en: Facebook, Google and other technology companies have hired luminaries from universities to work on AI in recent years.

zhs: Lee 介绍称，移民政策的变化也能帮助美国加强人工智能方面的工作。
en: Lee said immigration policy changes could also help the U.S. bolster its AI efforts.

zhs: “我觉得应该为人工智能博士，主动提供绿卡”，他说道。
en: "I think green cards should automatically be offered to PhD's in AI," he said.

zhs: 中国国务院于 2017 年 7 月发布了《新一代人工智能发展规划》。
en: China's State Council issued its Next Generation Artificial Intelligence Development Plan in July 2017.

zhs: Lee 介绍称，在美国，美国研究人员可以获美国国家科学基金会 (National Science Foundation) 和其他政府组织拨发的资金，同样，在中国，国家自然科学基金会为学术机构的研究者提供资金，但中国的学术工作质量相对较差。
en: China's National Natural Science Foundation provides funding to people at academic institutions similar to the way that the National Science Foundation and other government organizations dole out money to U.S. researchers, but the quality of academic work is lower in China, Lee said.

zhs: 今年年初，美国国防部成立了一个联合人工智能中心 (Joint Artificial Intelligence Center)，旨在吸引工业界和学术界的合作伙伴，此外，白宫还宣布成立了人工智能专责委员会 (Select Committee on Artificial Intelligence)。
en: Earlier this year the U.S. Defense Department established a Joint Artificial Intelligence Center, which is meant to involve partners from industry and academia, and the White House announced the formation of Select Committee on Artificial Intelligence.

zhs: 本月，DARPA 宣布，为一项名为 AI Next 的项目投资 20 亿美元。
en: And this month DARPA announced a $2 billion investment in an initiative called AI Next.

zhs: 目前，美国国家科学基金会每年在人工智能研究方面的投入资金都在 1 亿美元以上。
en: As for the NSF, it currently invests more than $100 million per year in AI research.

zhs: 而相比之下，几个月便称要建立国家人工智能安全委员会 (National Security Commission on Artificial Intelligence) 的美国立法部门，一直还没有采取行动。
en: Meanwhile, U.S. legislation that sought to create a National Security Commission on Artificial Intelligence has not seen action in months.

zhs: 马其顿就是否更改国名举行全民公投
en: Macedonians vote in referendum on whether to change country's name

zhs: 马其顿人民周日举行全民公投，以表决是否将国名改为“北马其顿共和国”，此举将解决马其顿与希腊之间长达数十年的争端问题，希腊曾阻止其加入欧盟和北大西洋公约组织 (NATO)。
en: The people of Macedonia voted in a referendum on Sunday on whether to change its name to "Republic of North Macedonia," a move that would resolve a decades-old dispute with Greece which had blocked its membership bids for the European Union and NATO.

zhs: 希腊有一个省也叫马其顿，保留着北部邻国的名字意味着希腊对其领土具有合法权利，并曾否决其加入北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 和欧盟 (EU)。
en: Greece, which has a province called Macedonia, maintains that its northern neighbor's name represents a claim on its territory and has vetoed its entrance into NATO and the EU.

zhs: 两国政府于六月份就拟议的新国名称达成协议，但民族主义反对者认为，更改国名将危害马其顿斯拉夫多数人口的种族认同。
en: The two governments struck a deal in June based on the proposed new name, but nationalist opponents argue the change would undermine the ethnic identity of Macedonia's Slavic majority population.

zhs: 总统格奥尔基·伊万诺夫 (Gjorge Ivanov) 表示，他不会参与公投，并且抵制活动令人怀疑投票结果是否会满足使公投生效的最低投票率 50%。
en: President Gjorge Ivanov has said he will not be voting in the referendum and a boycott campaign has cast doubts on whether turnout will meet the minimum 50 percent required for the referendum to be valid.

zhs: 有关公投投票的问题如下：“你是为了北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 和欧盟 (EU) 的成员身份而接受与希腊之间达成的协议吗？”
en: The question on the referendum ballot read: "Are you for NATO and EU membership with acceptance of the agreement with Greece."

zhs: 包括总理佐兰·扎埃夫 (Zoran Zaev) 在内的更名支持者们认为，马其顿是南斯拉夫解体衍生的国家之一，寻求加入欧盟 (EU) 和北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 等机构值得付出一定的代价。
en: Supporters of the name change, including Prime Minister Zoran Zaev, argue that it is a price worth paying to pursue admission into bodies such as the EU and NATO for Macedonia, one of the countries to emerge from the collapse of Yugoslavia.

zhs: “我今天来投票是为了国家的未来，为了马其顿的年轻一代，这样他们就可以在欧盟的保护伞下自由生活，因为这意味着我们所有人都能过上更安全的生活”，斯科普里 79 岁的奥利维拉·乔治耶夫斯卡 (Olivera Georgijevska) 说到。
en: "I came today to vote for the future of the country, for young people in Macedonia so they can be live freely under the umbrella of the European Union because it means safer lives for all of us," said Olivera Georgijevska, 79, in Skopje.

zhs: 虽然没有受到法律约束，也有足够的议会议员表示他们会果断遵守投票结果。
en: Although not legally binding, enough members of parliament have said they will abide by the vote's outcome to make it decisive.

zhs: 但更名需要获得议会三分之二多数投票。
en: The name change would requires a two-thirds majority in parliament.

zhs: 州选举委员会表示，截至下午 1 时，尚未收到任何不法行为报告。
en: The state election commission said there had been no reports of irregularities by 1 p.m.

zhs: 然而，投票率只有 16%，而 2016 年上次议会选举的投票率为 34%，当时有 66% 的注册选民参与投票。
en: However, turnout stood at only 16 percent, compared to 34 percent in last parliamentary election in 2016 when 66 percent of the registered voters cast their ballot.

zhs: “我来投票是为了我的孩子，我们住在欧洲”，首都斯科普里 62 岁的 Gjose Tanevski 说到。
en: "I came out to vote because of my children, our place is in Europe," said Gjose Tanevski, 62, a voter in the capital, Skopje.

zhs: 2018 年 9 月 30 日，马其顿总理佐兰·扎埃夫 (Zoran Zaev) 与妻子左瑞卡 (Zorica) 及儿子杜什克 (Dushko) 在马其顿更改国名的公投中投下了各自的选票，此次公投将为马其顿加入北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 和欧盟铺平道路。
en: Macedonia's PM Zoran Zaev, his wife Zorica and his son Dushko cast their ballot for the referendum in Macedonia on changing the country's name that would open the way for it to join NATO and the European Union in Strumica, Macedonia September 30, 2018.

zhs: 在斯科普里议会门前，54 岁的 Vladimir Kavardarkov 正在准备小型舞台，并把椅子挪到由抵制公投的人们搭建的帐篷前。
en: In front of parliament in Skopje, Vladimir Kavardarkov, 54, was preparing a small stage and pulling up chairs in front of tents set up by those who will boycott the referendum.

zhs: “虽然是为了北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 和欧盟 (EU)，但是我们想挺胸抬头地加入，而不是通过走后门”，Kavardarkov 说到。
en: "We are for NATO and EU, but we want to join with our heads up, not through the service door" Kavadarkov said.

zhs: “我们国家虽然贫穷，但是我们有尊严。
en: "We are a poor country, but we do have dignity.

zhs: 如果他们不把我们当成马其顿人，我们可以求助于其他国家，如中国或俄罗斯，成为亚欧一体化成员”。
en: If they don't want to take us as Macedonia, we can turn to others like China and Russia and become part of Euro-Asia integration."

zhs: 总体扎埃夫表示北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 的成员身份将为失业率高达 20% 以上的马其顿带来大量所需的投资。
en: Prime Minister Zaev says NATO membership will bring much needed investment to Macedonia, which has an unemployment rate of more than 20 percent.

zhs: “我相信大多数人多会支持公投，因为我们 80% 以上的民众都支持北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 和欧盟 (EU)”，扎埃夫投票后表示。
en: "I believe the huge majority will be in favor because more than 80 percent of our citizens are in favor of EU and NATO," Zaev said after casting his ballot.

zhs: 他说“支持”的投票结果将“确定我们的未来”。
en: He said that a "yes" result would be "confirmation of our future."

zhs: 马其顿政策研究所上周一公布的民意调查显示，30% 到 43% 的选民将参加公投 - 而这一数字则低于所需的投票率。
en: A poll published last Monday by Macedonia's Institute for Policy Research said between 30 and 43 percent of voters would take part in the referendum - below the required turnout.

zhs: 马其顿 Telma TV 的另一项民意调查发现，57% 的调查对象称计划参与周日的投票。
en: Another poll, conducted by Macedonia's Telma TV, found 57 percent of respondents planning to vote on Sunday.

zhs: 当然，70% 的民众表示他们将投出支持票。
en: Of those, 70 percent said they would vote yes.

zhs: 公投若要取得成功，投票率须达到 50% 加一票。
en: For the referendum to be successful turnout needs to be 50 percent plus one vote.

zhs: 公投失败意味着亲西方政府的政策将遭遇自去年五月上台以来的首次严重打击。
en: A failure in the referendum would represent the first serious blow to policy of the pro-Western government since it took over in May last year.

zhs: 观看：曼城队塞尔吉奥·阿奎罗 (Sergio Aguero) 突破布莱顿队的严密防守获得进球
en: Watch: Manchester City's Sergio Aguero navigates through entire Brighton defense for goal

zhs: 周六，在英格兰曼彻斯特的阿提哈德球场 (Etihad Stadium)，曼城队的塞尔吉奥·阿奎罗 (Sergio Aguero) 和拉希姆·斯特林 (Raheem Sterling) 双双突破布莱顿队的防守，最终以 2-0 获胜。
en: Sergio Aguero and Raheem Sterling dispatched of the Brighton defense in Manchester City's 2-0 win on Saturday at Etihad Stadium in Manchester, England.

zhs: 阿奎罗第 65 分钟的进球看起来十分轻松。
en: Aguero made it look ridiculously easy on his score in the 65th minute.

zhs: 比赛开始时，这位阿根廷前锋在中场接到传球。
en: The Argentine striker received a pass at midfield at the start of the sequence.

zhs: 他快速跑过布莱顿队的三名防守队员，冲向开阔地带。
en: He raced between three Brighton defenders, before slashing into the open field.

zhs: 随后阿奎罗发现自己被四名对方球员包围。
en: Aguero then found himself surrounded by four green shirts.

zhs: 他推开了一名防守队员，又在布莱顿禁区边缘超过了几名防守队员。
en: He pushed around one defender before outrunning several more at the edge of the Brighton box.

zhs: 然后把球推传到左边，传给了斯特林。
en: He then pushed a pass to his left, finding Sterling.

zhs: 这位英国前锋利用他在禁区内的第一次触球将球传回给阿奎罗，阿奎罗用右脚射门将球射入球门右侧，击倒了布莱顿队门将马修·瑞安 (Mathew Ryan)。
en: The English forward used his first touch in the box to give the ball back to Aguero, who used his right boot to beat Brighton keeper Mathew Ryan with a shot into the right side of the net.

zhs: “阿奎罗的脚部受伤了”，曼城队主教练佩普·瓜迪奥拉 (Pep Guardiola) 告诉记者。
en: "Aguero is struggling with some problems in his feet," City manager Pep Guardiola told reporters.

zhs: “我们曾谈到让他上场 55 或 60 分钟。
en: "We spoke about him playing 55, 60 minutes.

zhs: 他做到了。
en: That's what happened.

zhs: 幸运的是，就在那一刻他进球了。”
en: We were lucky he scored a goal in that moment."

zhs: 但是，是斯特林在英超联赛中为 Sky Blues 奠定了最初的优势。
en: But it was Sterling who gave the Sky Blues the initial advantage in the Premier League scuffle.

zhs: 那个进球发生在第 29 分钟。
en: That goal came in the 29th minute.

zhs: 在那场比赛中，阿奎罗在布莱顿队的后方接到了球。
en: Aguero received the ball deep in Brighton territory on that play.

zhs: 他以一个漂亮的直传将球沿着左翼传给了勒鲁瓦·萨内 (Leroy Sane)。
en: He sent a beautiful through ball along the left flank to Leroy Sane.

zhs: 几次触球后，萨内把斯特林引向了远门柱。
en: Sane took a few touches before leading Sterling toward the far post.

zhs: 这位 Sky Blues 的前锋在滑出界外之前轻松将球入网。
en: The Sky Blues forward tapped the ball into the net just before sliding out of bounds.

zhs: 周二下午 12：55，曼城队将在德国辛斯海姆的莱茵·内卡竞技球场 (Rhein-Neckar-Arena)，迎战欧洲冠军联赛 (Champions League) 小组赛中的对手霍芬海姆队。
en: City battles Hoffenheim in Champions League group play at 12:55 p.m. on Tuesday at Rhein-Neckar-Arena in Sinsheim, Germany.

zhs: 谢泽尔 (Scherzer) 欲在对抗落矶队时从中作梗
en: Scherzer wants to play spoiler vs. Rockies

zhs: 由于国民队在季后赛争夺中遭遇淘汰，再无更多理由迫使他们再次首发。
en: With the Nationals eliminated from playoff contention, there wasn't much reason to force another start.

zhs: 求胜心切的谢泽尔希望在周日对阵科罗拉多落矶队的比赛中担任首发，但前提是落矶队仍沉浸在季后赛的影响中，落矶队较国家联盟 (NL) 西区的洛杉矶道奇队领先一场。
en: But the ever-competitive Scherzer hopes to take the mound on Sunday against the Colorado Rockies, but only if there are still playoff implications for the Rockies, who hold a one-game lead over the Los Angeles Dodgers in the NL West.

zhs: 周五晚上，落矶队以 5-2 战胜了国民队，锁定了至少一个外卡名额，但他们仍然希望拿下首个分区冠军。
en: The Rockies clinched at least a wild-card spot with a 5-2 win over the Nationals on Friday night, but are still looking to lock up their first division title.

zhs: “即使不为别的，至少我们能够在万众瞩目的丹佛参与比赛，而其他球队也将打出我今年将面临的最高水平。
en: "Even though we're playing for nothing, at least we can be able to toe the rubber knowing that the atmosphere here in Denver with the crowd and the other team would be playing at probably the highest level of any point I would face this year.

zhs: 我怎么会不愿意参加比赛呢？”
en: Why wouldn't I want to compete in that?"

zhs: 国民队还没有宣布周日的首发阵容，但是据报道称，在这种情况下他们很可能让谢泽尔投球。
en: The Nationals have yet to announce a starter for Sunday, but are reportedly inclined to let Scherzer pitch in such a situation.

zhs: 这将是谢泽尔的第 34 次首发，他已经于周四开始在牛棚练投，将在正常休息的周日投球。
en: Scherzer, who would be making his 34th start, threw a bullpen session on Thursday and would be pitching on his normal rest Sunday.

zhs: 这位华盛顿的右手球员在本赛季的 222 又 2/3 局中，取得了 18 胜 7 败的成绩，防御率为 2.53，得到 300 个三振。
en: The Washington right-hander is 18-7 with a 2.53 ERA and 300 strikeouts in 220 2/3 innings this season.

zhs: 特朗普在西弗吉尼亚州举行集会
en: Trump rallies in West Virginia

zhs: 总统在谈到共和党选情在中期选举中的重要性时，间接影射他选中的最高法院选民布雷特·卡瓦诺 (Brett Kavanaugh) 所面临的处境。
en: The President obliquely referred to the situation surrounding his Supreme Court pick Brett Kavanaugh while talking about the importance of Republican turnout in the midterm elections.

zhs: “我们所做的一切关乎 11 月份的走向。
en: "All of what we've done is at stake in November.

zhs: 距离我们一生中最重要的一次选举，还有五周的时间。
en: Five weeks away from one of the most important elections in our lifetimes.

zhs: 这次事关重大，我不是在竞选，我这样四处奔波，就是为了能让你们选出优秀的候选人”，他说道。
en: This is one of the big, big -- I'm not running but I'm really running that's why I'm all over the place fighting for great candidates," he said.

zhs: 特朗普继续说道，“你们也看到了，民主党人是多么可怕，你们现在就能看到。
en: Trump continued, "You see this horrible, horrible radical group of Democrats, you see it happening right now.

zhs: 他们决心要使用任何必要的手段夺回权力，你们能看到他们的卑鄙肮脏。
en: And they're determined to take back power by using any means necessary, you see the meanness, the nastiness.

zhs: 他们不管会伤到什么人，为了掌控权力，拿到控制权，把谁踩到脚下，这他们都无所谓，他们眼里只有权力和控制权，而我们是不会给他们的。”
en: They don't care who they hurt, who they have to run over in order to get power and control, that's what they want is power and control, we're not going to give it to them."

zhs: 民主党肩负的使命就是“抵抗和阻挠”。
en: Democrats, he said, are on a mission to "resist and obstruct."

zhs: “你们在过去的四天里看到了这一点，”他说道。他称民主党“愤怒、可耻、卑鄙、虚伪”。
en: "And you see that over the last four days," he said, calling the Democrats "angry and mean and nasty and untruthful."

zhs: 他提到参议院司法委员会 (Senate Judiciary Committee) 民主党参议员黛安·范斯坦 (Dianne Feinstein) 的名字，引得现场一片唏嘘。
en: He referenced Senate Judiciary Committee ranking Democratic Sen. Dianne Feinstein by name, which received loud boos from the audience.

zhs: “还记得她是怎么回答的吗？
en: "Remember her answer?

zhs: 是你泄露的文件吗？
en: Did you leak the document?

zhs: 呃，呃，什么。
en: Uh, uh, what.

zhs: 不是，呃，不是，别人给我的，这种肢体语言太拙劣了，是我见过的最拙劣的肢体语言。”
en: No, uh no, I wait one - that was really bad body language - the worst body language I've ever seen."

zhs: 工党不再是广教派。
en: Labour is no longer a broad church.

zhs: 这里容不得直言的人
en: It is intolerant of those who speak their minds

zhs: 当地 Momentum 政党的积极分子投票谴责我时，我一点都没觉得奇怪。
en: When Momentum's activists in my local party voted to censure me, it was hardly a surprise.

zhs: 毕竟，我工党议员中，最后得知自己并不受人欢迎的议员，而不受欢迎的原因，就是因为我们表达自己的想法。
en: After all, I'm the latest in a line of Labour MPs to be told we are not welcome - all for speaking our minds.

zhs: 我的议会同事 Joan Ryan 由于坚决反对反犹太主义，也受到了类似的待遇。
en: My parliamentary colleague Joan Ryan received similar treatment because she resolutely stood up to antisemitism.

zhs: 而针对我的动议批评，是因为我反对 Jeremy Corbyn。
en: In my case, the censure motion criticised me for disagreeing with Jeremy Corbyn.

zhs: 讽刺的是，在有关负责任的经济政策、国家安全和欧洲问题上，都出现了类似的问题，在这类问题中，Jeremy 与之前的领导人持反对意见。
en: On the importance of a responsible economic policy, on national security, on Europe, ironically similar issues on which Jeremy disagreed with previous leaders.

zhs: 周五诺丁汉东部工党会议的通知中介绍道，“我们希望会议具有包容性，能取得富有成效的结果。”
en: The notice for the Nottingham East Labour meeting on Friday stated that "we want the meetings to be inclusive and productive."

zhs: 在我担任当地工党议员的这八年里，大部分时间，星期五晚上的 GC 会议都是这个样子。
en: For most of my eight years as the local Labour MP, the Friday night GC meetings have been exactly that.

zhs: 不幸的是，如今，这已经不再是诸多会议的基调，人们早已经忘了“向善，温和” (kinder, gentler) 的政治诺言，甚至似乎都未曾开始践行过。
en: Sadly today, it is not the tone of many meetings and the promise of "kinder, gentler" politics has long been forgotten if, indeed, it ever began.

zhs: 工党不能容忍相左的观点，所有观点的评判基础都是工党领袖是否接受。这样的势头日渐明显。
en: It has become increasingly apparent that differing views are not tolerated in the Labour party and every opinion is judged on whether it is acceptable to the party leadership.

zhs: 这种现象始于 Jeremy 担任工党领袖之后不久，我之前曾认为，我跟我的同僚们，都有同样政治观点，可他们开始希望我转变观点，让我站在我绝不会认同的立场，无论是在国家安全问题上，还是在欧盟单一市场的问题上。
en: This started shortly after Jeremy became leader, as colleagues with whom I had previously thought I shared a similar political outlook began expecting me to do a U-turn and take positions I would never have otherwise agreed with - whether on national security or the EU single market.

zhs: 每当我公开发言，我所说的内容并不重要，随之而来的便是社交媒体上的连番指责，要求取消选举，谴责中派政治，或是告诉我不配加入工党。
en: Whenever I speak publicly - and it doesn't really matter what I say - there follows a tirade of abuse on social media calling for deselection, denouncing the politics of the centre, telling me I should not be in the Labour party.

zhs: 经历这种事的人，并非只有我一个人。
en: And that is not just my experience.

zhs: 事实上，我清楚自己相比有些同事而言，还算是幸运的，因为针对我的评论往往都是政治性言论。
en: Indeed, I know I am more fortunate than some of my colleagues as the comments directed at me tend to be political.

zhs: 我的好多同僚们，每天都要面临洪流一般的罪名，或是使用性别歧视的侮辱性语言，或是言语具有种族主义色彩。但他们从未回避过，我佩服他们这种专业精神和坚定的决心。
en: I am in awe of the professionalism and determination of those colleagues who face a torrent of sexist or racist abuse every day but never shy away.

zhs: 这个政治时代最令人失望的一点，就是侮辱语言成为了一种常态。
en: One of the most disappointing aspects of this era of politics is how levels of abuse have become normalised.

zhs: Jeremy Corbyn 上周称，工党应该营造一种宽容的文化氛围。
en: Jeremy Corbyn claimed last week that the Labour party should foster a culture of tolerance.

zhs: 事实是，我们不再是有着多种声音的大教会，而且，一个又一个的“不信任”动议，一条又一条的选拔规定的改变，让工党变得更加狭隘。
en: The reality is we are no longer that broad church and with every "no-confidence" motion or change of selection rules the party becomes narrower.

zhs: 在过去的两年里，我收到了很多建议，力劝我保持低调，不要那么直言不讳，这样我才能“独善其身”。
en: I have had lots of advice over the past two years urging me to keep my head down, not to be so vocal and then I would "be all right."

zhs: 可这不是我从政的初衷。
en: But that is not what I came into politics to do.

zhs: 32 年前，在我还是一名在校学生的时候，我加入了工党。当时，由于撒切尔政府的疏忽，我们综合学校课堂基本陷入瘫痪，从那时起，无论是作为议员，还是政府大臣，我都竭尽全力，为最需要公共服务的人，谋求更好的公共服务。
en: Ever since I joined Labour 32 years ago as a school pupil, provoked by the Thatcher government's neglect that had left my comprehensive school classroom literally falling down, I've sought to champion better public services for those who need them most - whether as a local councillor or government minister.

zhs: 我从未隐瞒过我的政治，包括在上次大选中。
en: I have never hidden my politics, including at the last election.

zhs: 对于我的政策立场以及我与现任领导存在分歧的领域，诺丁汉东区的任何人都不会觉得奇怪。
en: No one in Nottingham East could have been in any way confused about my policy positions and areas of disagreement with the current leadership.

zhs: 对于在周五提出议案的人，我要说的是，我不明白，在我们的国家努力实现脱欧，损害我们的家庭、企业和公共服务之时，你们还在浪费时间和精力，声伐我是否忠诚于工党领袖。
en: To those who promoted the motion on Friday, all I would say is that when the country is ploughing towards a Brexit that will hurt households, businesses and our public services, I do not understand the desire to waste time and energy on my loyalty to the Labour party leader.

zhs: 其实，我想对我的选民（无论是否属于工党成员），而非诺丁汉 Momentum，说的一句话是：能为你们服务我荣幸备至，我保证，任何阻止当选的威胁或政治私利，都无法阻止我按照我觉得最符合你们所有人权益的方式行事。
en: But really the one message I have is not to Nottingham Momentum, it is to my constituents, whether Labour members or not: I am proud to serve you and I promise that no amount of deselection threats or political expediency will deter me from acting in what I believe are the best interests of you all.

zhs: Chris Leslie 现任诺丁汉东区议员
en: Chris Leslie is MP for Nottingham East

zhs: 艾尔联 38-17 力克梅尔罗斯：不败艾尔联再次获胜
en: Ayr 38 - 17 Melrose: Unbeaten Ayr go top

zhs: 最后的两次尝试可能在某些程度上影响了最终的结果，但毫无疑问，在这场妙趣横生的比赛中获胜，艾尔联可谓是当之无愧。
en: Two late tries may have skewed the final result somewhat, but there is no doubt Ayr deserved to triumph in this wonderfully-entertaining Tennent's Premiership match of the day.

zhs: 他们现在位居榜首，是十支球队中唯一一支不败的球队。
en: They now top the table, the only unbeaten side of the ten.

zhs: 最终，他们出色的防守以及超乎寻常的机会把握，令主队和教练彼得·默基 (Peter Murchie) 很是满意。
en: In the end, it was their superior defence, as much as their better chance-taking, which carried the home side and coach Peter Murchie had every right to be pleased.

zhs: “我们经历了比赛的重重考验，但到目前为止仍保持着不败的战绩，为此我必须感到高兴”，默基表示。
en: "We've been tested over our games this far, and we're still unbeaten, so I have to be happy," he said.

zhs: 梅尔罗斯队的罗宾·克里斯蒂 (Robyn Christie) 表示：“荣誉属于艾尔联，他们比我们更好地把握住了机遇”。
en: Robyn Christie of Melrose said: "Credit to Ayr, they took their chances better than we did."

zhs: 格兰特·安德森 (Grant Anderson) 在第 14 分钟的尝试使艾尔联暂时领先，随后被弗雷泽·克里莫 (Frazier Climo) 换下，但是由于在对抗勇士队的比赛中苏格兰队员罗里·休斯 (Hughes) 遭遇黄牌，使得梅尔罗斯队在人数上占据优势，而贾森·巴格特 (Jason Baggot) 则抓住了没有被换下场的机会。
en: Grant Anderson's 14th minute try, converted by Frazier Climo, put Ayr in front, but, a yellow card for Scotland cap Rory Hughes, released for the game by Warriors, allowed Melrose to make numbers tell and Jason Baggot grabbed an unconverted try.

zhs: 中场休息前，克里莫以一记点球扩大了艾尔联的领先优势，进球后，中场休息时，他获得附加分独自将比分变为 17-5。
en: Climo stretched the Ayr lead with a penalty, before, right on half-time, he scored then converted a solo try to make it 17-5 to Ayr at the break.

zhs: 但梅尔罗斯下半场的开局表现很好，而巴格特换上的帕特里克·安德森 (Patrick Anderson) 的一记射门将比分差距缩小到了五分。
en: But Melrose began the second half well and Patrick Anderson's try, converted by Baggot, reduced the leeway to five points.

zhs: 随后，Ruaridh Knott 由于受伤严重，被担架抬出场外，耽搁了较长的时间，比赛重新开始后，艾尔联通过克里莫换上的斯塔福·麦克道尔 (Stafford McDowall) 的一次射门再次将比分拉大。
en: There was then a lengthy hold-up for a serious injury to Ruaridh Knott, who was stretchered off, and from the restart, Ayr surged further ahead through a Stafford McDowall try, converted by Climo.

zhs: 随后艾尔联的代理队长布莱尔·麦克弗森 (Blair Macpherson) 遭遇黄牌警告，梅尔罗斯队在人数上再次占据优势，凭借未被换下的布鲁斯·科文 (Bruce Colvine) 的射门，打破了巨大的压力魔咒。
en: Ayr acting captain Blair Macpherson was then yellow-carded, and again, Melrose made the extra man pay with an unconverted Bruce Colvine try, at the end of a spell of fierce pressure.

zhs: 然而主队恢复气势后，当斯特鲁安·哈钦森 (Struan Hutchinson) 因界外点球无球撞倒克里莫而被黄牌警告时，麦克弗森在艾尔联进攻队员后方持球触地得分。
en: The home side came back, however, and when Struan Hutchinson was yellow-carded for tackling Climo without the ball, from the penalty line-out, MacPherson touched down at the back of the advancing Ayr maul.

zhs: 与比赛重新开始时一样，克里莫再次被换下，凯尔·罗维 (Kyle Rowe) 接到大卫·阿姆斯特朗 (David Armstrong) 的开球后，主队的第五次尝试送走了侧卫格里高尔·亨利 (Gregor Henry)。
en: Climo converted, as he did again almost from the restart, after Kyle Rowe gathered David Armstrong's box kick and sent flanker Gregor Henry away for the home side's fifth try.

zhs: Still Game 主演准备进军餐饮业
en: Still Game star looks set for new career in restaurant industry

zhs: Still Game 主演福特·基兰 (Ford Kieran) 似乎准备进军酒店业，此前曾被发现担任一家注册餐饮公司的董事。
en: Still Game star Ford Kieran looks set to move into the hospitality industry after it was discovered he's been named as the director of a licensed restaurants company.

zhs: 这位 56 岁的演员在脍炙人口的英国广播公司 (BBC) 电视剧中扮演杰克·贾维斯 (Jack Jarvis)，这部剧由他编写并与长期的喜剧搭档格雷格·亨普希尔 (Greg Hemphill) 联合主演。
en: The 56-year-old plays Jack Jarvis on the popular BBC show, which he writes and co-stars with long-time comedy partner Greg Hemphill.

zhs: 二人宣布，即将播出的第九季将是该剧的最后一季，而基兰似乎也在规划着效仿克雷格朗的生活。
en: The duo have announced that the upcoming ninth series will be the final one in the show's run, and it appears Kiernan is planning for life after Craiglang.

zhs: 官方记录显示，基兰是 Adriftmorn Limited 的董事。
en: According to official record listings, he is the director of Adriftmorn Limited.

zhs: 这位演员拒绝对此事发表评论，尽管《苏格兰太阳报》一位提供消息者暗示基兰希望加入克雷格朗“红火的餐饮业”。
en: The actor declined to comment on the story, though a Scottish Sun source hinted that Kiernan was looking to get involved in Glasgow's "thriving restaurant trade."

zhs: “大海属于我们”：陆围国家玻利维亚希望法院裁定重启太平洋之路
en: 'The sea is ours': landlocked Bolivia hopes court will reopen path to Pacific

zhs: 水手们在拉巴斯装备精良的海军总部巡查。
en: Sailors patrol a rigging-clad naval headquarters in La Paz.

zhs: 公共建筑上，一面海蓝色的旗帜迎风飘扬。
en: Public buildings fly an ocean-blue flag.

zhs: 从的的喀喀湖到亚马逊的海军基地，题满了字：“大海从法律上来说，是属于我们的。
en: Naval bases from Lake Titicaca to the Amazon are daubed with the motto: "The sea is ours by right.

zhs: 收回大海，是我们的义务。”
en: To recover it is a duty."

zhs: 在整个陆地包围的玻利维亚，在 19 世纪发生的一起血腥的资源冲突中，海岸线落入智利之手的记忆仍然历历在目。玻利维亚渴望再次驶向太平洋。
en: Throughout landlocked Bolivia, the memory of a coastline lost to Chile in a bloody 19th-century resource conflict is still vivid - as is the yearning to sail the Pacific Ocean once more.

zhs: 这个几十年已久的希望达到了最高点，因为玻利维亚在经过五年的审议后，终于在 10 月 1 日等来了国际法院的裁决。
en: Those hopes are perhaps at their highest in decades, as Bolivia awaits a ruling by the international court of justice on 1 October after five years of deliberations.

zhs: 玻利维亚外交官罗伯托·卡尔扎迪拉 (Roberto Calzadilla) 介绍称：“玻利维亚有动力，人民上下一心，和谐团结，自然能等来积极的结局。”
en: "Bolivia has the momentum, a spirit of unity and serenity, and is of course expecting with a positive view the outcome," said Roberto Calzadilla, a Bolivian diplomat.

zhs: 国际法院将在全国各大屏幕上直播整个裁决过程，玻利维亚人可以全程观看。希望在经过几十年的时断时续的谈判后，海牙法庭能够支持玻利维亚的主张。智利有义务通过谈判授予玻利维亚一个主权出海口。
en: Many Bolivians will watch the ICJ ruling on big screens across the country, hopeful that the tribunal in The Hague will find in favour of Bolivia's claim that - after decades of fitful talks - Chile is obliged to negotiate granting Bolivia a sovereign outlet to the sea.

zhs: 玻利维亚魅力超凡的总统埃沃·莫拉莱斯 (Evo Morales) 是土生土长的本土人，同样会关注周一的裁决。这位总统能否在明年的竞选中连任，颇受争议。
en: Evo Morales, Bolivia's charismatic indigenous president - who faces a controversial battle for re-election next year - also has plenty riding on Monday's ruling.

zhs: 他在八月底曾郑重宣布称，“我们即将重返太平洋”。
en: "We are very close to returning to the Pacific Ocean," he vowed in late August.

zhs: 但一些分析人士认为，法院不太可能作出利于玻利维亚的决定，如果真的作出这样的决定，也不会改变什么。
en: But some analysts believe that the court is unlikely to decide in Bolivia's favour - and that little would change if it did.

zhs: 这个总部设在荷兰的联合国机构，无权授予智利领土，而且已出台规定，不会确定可能的谈判结果。
en: The Netherlands-based UN body has no power to award Chilean territory, and has stipulated that it will not determine the outcome of possible talks.

zhs: 智利的一位国际法专家 Paz Zárate 表示，最后的辩论审理刚刚结束六个月，国际法院便进行裁决，这表明案件“并不复杂”。
en: That the ICJ's ruling comes only six months after the final arguments were heard indicates the case "wasn't complicated," said Paz Zárate, a Chilean expert in international law.

zhs: 而且过去四年丝毫没有推动玻利维亚的这项目标，相反可能倒退了。
en: And far from furthering Bolivia's cause, the past four years may have set it back.

zhs: “当前玻利维亚政府已经阻断了进入太平洋的权限”，Zárate 介绍道。
en: "The issue of access to the sea has been hijacked by the current Bolivian administration," said Zárate.

zhs: 她表示，Morales 的挑衅性的言论耗尽了智利人所剩的善意。
en: Morales's belligerent rhetoric has sapped any residual Chilean goodwill, she suggested.

zhs: 玻利维亚和智利迟早会继续开展对话，但在此之后，要继续开展对话便难上加难。
en: Bolivia and Chile will at some point continue to talk, but it will be extremely difficult to hold discussions after this.

zhs: 自 1962 年以来，两国再也没有互换过大使。
en: The two countries have not exchanged ambassadors since 1962.

zhs: 玻利维亚驻海牙代表，前总统爱德华多·罗德里格斯·韦尔泽 (Eduardo Rodríguez Veltzé) 否定了法院决策异常迅速的这一说法。
en: Former president Eduardo Rodríguez Veltzé, Bolivia's representative at The Hague, rejected the idea that the court's decision-making was unusually speedy.

zhs: 周一的结果会为玻利维亚“带来开启与智利关系新时代的绝佳机会”，以及“结束 139 年来分歧的互惠互利”的机会，他介绍道。
en: Monday will bring Bolivia "an extraordinary opportunity to open a new era of relations with Chile" and a chance to "put an end to 139 years of disagreements with mutual benefits," he said.

zhs: 对于莫拉莱斯（仍然是拉丁美洲最受欢迎的总统之一）是想利用海事问题作为政治拐杖的这种说法，卡尔扎迪拉同样表示否认。
en: Calzadilla also denied that Morales - still one of Latin America's most popular presidents - was using the maritime issue as a political crutch.

zhs: “玻利维亚永远不会放弃对太平洋的使用权利”，他补充道。
en: "Bolivia will never give up its right to have access to the Pacific Ocean," he added.

zhs: “裁决将为我们创造机会，让我们战胜过去的历史。”
en: "The ruling is an opportunity to see that we need to overcome the past."

zhs: 朝鲜表示，若无法信任美国便不会解除核武装
en: North Korea says nuclear disarmament won't come unless it can trust US

zhs: 朝鲜外务相李勇浩表示，如果无法信任美国，朝鲜绝不会解除核武装。
en: North Korean Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho says his nation will never disarm its nuclear weapons first if it can't trust Washington.

zhs: 在周六举行的联合国大会上，李勇浩发表演讲。
en: Ri was speaking Saturday at the United Nations General Assembly.

zhs: 他呼吁美国履行于新加坡峰会期间，两国领导人之间所作的承诺。
en: He called on the United States to follow through on promises made during a summit in Singapore between the rivals' leaders.

zhs: 李勇浩的此番言论事出有因，三个多月之前，美国国务卿迈克·庞培 (Mike Pompeo) 与朝鲜领导人金正恩 (Kim Jong Un) 在新加坡会面，想重启陷入僵局的核外交。
en: His comments come as US. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo seems to be on the verge of restarting deadlocked nuclear diplomacy more than three months after the Singapore with North Korea's Kim Jong Un.

zhs: 李勇浩说，想通过持续的制裁，甚至反对发表终战宣言，就能逼朝鲜下跪，这简直就是在做“白日梦”。
en: Ri says it's a "pipe dream" that continued sanctions and U.S. objection to a declaration ending the Korean War will ever bring the North to its knees.

zhs: 如果平壤不能首先做出重大的裁军行动，在同意做出宣言这一问题上，华盛顿便会谨慎提防。
en: Washington is wary of agreeing to the declaration without Pyongyang first making significant disarmament moves.

zhs: 金正日和美国总统唐纳德·特朗普都希望能再次举行峰会。
en: Both Kim and U.S. President Donald Trump want a second summit.

zhs: 但人们普遍怀疑朝鲜是否真的会放弃其核武库，毕竟，朝鲜极有可能将其视为是保障其安全的唯一途径。
en: But there is widespread skepticism that Pyongyang is serious about renouncing an arsenal that the country likely sees as the only way to guarantee its safety.

zhs: 庞培计划下个月访问朝鲜，商量再次进行韩美领导人峰会的事宜。
en: Pompeo is planning to visit Pyongyang next month to prepare for a second Kim-Trump summit.

zhs: 巴黎时装秀带来众多最新系列头饰
en: Paris fashion shows reveal latest line in massive headwear on it's way to a High Street near you

zhs: 如果你在犹豫是不是要再买几顶帽子，或是遮挡阳光，那就不用再犹豫了。
en: If you want to upsize your hat collection or completely block out the sun then look no further.

zhs: 华伦天奴 (Valentino) 和托姆·布朗 (Thom Browne) 的设计师们，在巴黎时装周的秀场上，推出了古怪的超大头饰 SS19 系列，惊艳全场。
en: Designers Valentino and Thom Browne unveiled an array of wacky oversized head gear for their SS19 collection on the runway which dazzled the style set at Paris Fashion Week.

zhs: 今年夏天，极不实用的帽子席卷了 Instagram，于是，这些设计师们纷纷将自己设计的抢眼的帽子带到了 T 台。
en: Highly impractical hats have swept Instagram this summer and these designers have sent their eye-popping creations down the catwalk.

zhs: 华伦天奴最引人注目的单品是一顶米色过顶帽子，饰以羽毛状的宽边，将模特们的头完全遮盖住。
en: The stand out piece by Valentino was an over-the-top beige hat adorned with a feather-like wide brim that swamped the models heads.

zhs: 其他超大尺寸的饰品还包括饰有珠宝的西瓜帽、巫师帽，甚至还有菠萝帽，不过，这些设计的初衷可不是为了保暖。
en: Other over-sized accessories included bejeweled watermelons, a wizard hat and even a pineapple - but they are not designed to keep your head warm.

zhs: 正值万圣节来临之际，Thom Browne 推出了一系列造型奇异的面具。
en: Thom Browne also revealed a selection of bizarre masks- and just in time for Halloween.

zhs: 许多色彩缤纷的面具，自带双唇，更像是 Hannibal Lecter，而非高级时装。
en: Many of the colourful masks had sewn up lips and resembled more like Hannibal Lecter than haute couture.

zhs: 有的酷似水肺潜水装备，还配有呼吸管和护目镜，有的则好似融化的冰淇淋蛋筒。
en: One creation resembled scuba diving gear complete with snorkel and goggles, while another looked like a melted ice cream cone.

zhs: 继续寻找时尚代言物的旅途中，你还会有更惊奇的发现。
en: And if you continue the huge fashion statement- you are in luck.

zhs: 时尚观察员预测，巨大的帽子可能即将登上您身边的时尚大街。
en: Style watchers predict that the enormous bonnets could be making their way to high streets near you.

zhs: Rihanna、Emily Ratajkowski 头顶上的 “La Bomba” 草帽十分惹眼，夸张超大，帽檐宽度足足有 2 英尺，可想而知，随后便会成为炙手可热的流行装饰。
en: The out-sized hats come hot on the heels of 'La Bomba', the straw hat with a two-foot wide brim that's been seen on everyone from Rihanna to Emily Ratajkowski.

zhs: 在社交媒体上溅起的非常不切实际的帽子背后的邪教标签在T台上发送了另一个重要的创作 - 一个几乎和穿泳衣的模特一样大的稻草沙滩包。这顶没什么实用性的帽子在社交媒体上被大肆宣传，其背后的时尚标签让另一大创意登上了 T 台——一种几乎和穿着泳衣的模特一样大的稻草沙滩包。
en: The cult label behind the highly impractical hat that was splashed across social media sent another big creation down the catwalk - a straw beach bag almost as big as the swimsuit-clad model toting it.

zhs: 这款焦橙色拉菲草袋，边饰为酒椰色，上面饰有白色皮革手柄，是巴黎时装周 Jacquemus'La Riviera SS19 系列中的点睛之笔。
en: The burnt orange raffia bag, trimmed with raffia fringing and topped with a white leather handle, was the stand out piece in Jacquemus' La Riviera SS19 collection at Paris Fashion Week.

zhs: 名人造型师 Luke Armitage 对 FEMAIL 介绍称：“估计明年夏天，时尚大街便会出现各种大帽子和沙滩包，因为设计师制造出了声势浩大的影响，对超大配饰的需求不容忽视。”
en: Celebrity stylist Luke Armitage told FEMAIL: 'I'm expecting to see large hats and beach bags arrive on the high street for next summer - as the designer has made such a huge impact it would be hard to ignore the demand for the oversized accessories.'

zhs: 约翰·爱德华 (John Edward)：语言技能对全球公民而言至关重要
en: John Edward: Languages skills essential for global citizens

zhs: 苏格兰的私立学校一直保持着优异的学业成绩记录，2018 年亦是如此，也取得了一系列可喜的考试成绩，而个人和集体在体育、艺术、音乐以及其他社区工作等方面取得的成功，更是锦上添花。
en: Scotland's independent schools maintain a track record of academic excellence, and this has continued in 2018 with another set of outstanding exam results, which is only strengthened by individual and collective success in sports, art, music and other community endeavours.

zhs: 这些私立学校中聚集着苏格兰全国 30,000 多名学生，在苏格兰私立学校委员会 (SCIS) 的带领下，努力为学生和家长们提供最优质的服务。
en: With upwards of 30,000 pupils across Scotland, these schools, represented by The Scottish Council of Independent Schools (SCIS), strive to deliver the best level of service to their pupils and parents.

zhs: 私立学校的宗旨是为学生们的继续教育和高等教育、职业选择以及作为全球公民的社会地位打下良好基础。
en: Independent schools aim to prepare their pupils for further and higher education, their chosen career and their place as global citizens.

zhs: 作为能够设计和实施定制化学校课程的教育机构，我们有幸得以见证现代语言在学校里始终是一门备受欢迎的学科。
en: As an education sector that can design and implement a bespoke school curriculum, we are seeing modern languages continue as a popular and desired subject of choice within schools.

zhs: 纳尔逊·曼德拉 (Nelson Mandela) 曾说过：“如果你用别人能理解的语言与对方谈话，你的话会进入对方的脑中。
en: Nelson Mandela said: "If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head.

zhs: 如果你用对方的母语与之谈话，你的话会进入对方的心里。”
en: If you talk to him in his own language that goes to his heart."

zhs: 这句话提醒了我们，当我们想要与外国友人建立关系和信任时，我们不能只依靠英语。
en: This is a powerful reminder that we can't just rely on English when wanting to build relationships and trust with people from other countries.

zhs: 从今年最新的考试结果来看，私立学校的语言通过率稳居榜首。
en: From this year's recent exam results, we can see that languages are topping the league tables with the highest pass rates within independent schools.

zhs: 学习外语的学生中有 68% 取得了 A 级成绩。
en: A total of 68 per cent of pupils who studied foreign languages achieved a Higher grade A.

zhs: 来自苏格兰私立学校委员会 (SCIS) 74 所成员学校的数据显示，72% 的学生中文取得了 A 级成绩，而其中 72% 学习德语的学生，69% 学习法语的学生以及 63% 学习西班牙语的学生也都取得了 A 级成绩。
en: The data, collected from SCIS's 74 member schools, showed that 72 per cent of students achieved a Higher grade A in Mandarin, while 72 per cent of those studying German, 69 per cent of those studying French and 63 per cent studying Spanish also achieved an A.

zhs: 这表明，苏格兰的私立学校正在支持着外语成为一项儿童和青少年未来无疑会需要的重要技能。
en: This demonstrates that independent schools in Scotland are supporting foreign languages as vital skills that children and young people will undoubtedly require in the future.
